loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy supplies at wholesale, like hair treatments, shampoo, conditioner, nail polish, and more

loans.name: Doris Amparo

texts.es:
Doris es una mujer separada, es una persona muy trabajadora y muy responsable, trabajó con su familia en  diferentes negocios donde adquirió experiencia en las ventas. 

Desde hace 1 año inició con una tienda de abarrotes con muy poco capital para trabajarla como independiente y  labora desde las 7:00 am a 10:00.  

Doris sueña con tener un supermercado a futuro, por lo pronto con el crédito solicitado desea adquirir un congelador para su pequeña tienda.

Entre sus sueños más importantes están el poder expandir su negocio, aumentar sus ventas, mejorar las condiciones de su vivienda y asegurar la sostenibilidad de su negocio.

Con este negocio ha podido salir adelante poco a poco y ha intentado mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Doris is separated. She is a very responsible and hardworking woman. She has worked with her family in different businesses through which she acquired experience in sales. A year ago, she started a grocery store with very little capital. She wanted to work for herself and is doing so from 7:00 am to 10:00.  

Doris would like to have a supermarket in the future, but for now she will use the loan she is requesting to buy a freezer for her little store. Some of her main goals are to be able to expand her business, increase sales, improve her housing conditions, and secure her business' sustainability.

Her business is allowing her to get ahead little by little, and she is trying to improve her quality of life.

loans.use: to buy a freezer for her store.

loans.name: Frengue

texts.pt:
Nasceu em Namaacha Província de Maputo tem 41 anos de idade, vive maritalmente pai de 4 filhos menores de idade, responsabiliza-se pelo seu irmão e sua mãe que vivem em sua casa.
Trabalha na educação como técnico administrativo a mais de 15 anos onde aufere um valor que aplica nas despesas da sua casa. Com empréstimo solicitado pretende adquirir bens para a sua casa como: mesa e geleira. Este é o seu 4º empréstimo na Hluvuku.
Futuramente pretende terminar a faculdade e garantir o ensino dos seus filhos até ao nível superior.
texts.en:
Frengue comes from Namaacha, province of Maputo. He's 41 years old and married. He has four underage children, and he's responsible for his brother and his mother who live with him.
He has worked as an administrative assistant in the education field for over 15 years. He earns an income which he uses for household expenses. With the requested loan he intends to purchase goods for his house such as a table and a refrigerator. This is his 4th loan with Hluvuku.
In the future he intends to finish college and provide an education for his children up to university level.

loans.use: to purchase goods for his house such as a table and a refrigerator.

loans.name: Adelaida

texts.en: Farming has been the main source of income for Adelaida since she was young. Her previous loan, which was used for farming, has been repaid successfully. Recently, she took a new loan to buy organic fertilizer and peanut seeds in addition to her corn production. Hoping to have a better source of income for the family in the future, she cultivates her farm well.

loans.use: to buy organic fertilizer and peanut seeds

loans.name: Jaime Rafael

texts.es: Jaime de 34 años de edad vive con su compañera de vida en casa propia, el es empleado de una empresa privada desde hace 8 años, con lo que obtiene de su trabajo logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, el está solicitando un crédito para la compra de una lámpara salvasol, que es una lámpara de carga con energía de paneles solares, dirigida principalmente a hogares del área rural que carecen de conexión de energía eléctrica, por esa razón está solicitando el crédito y poder comprar dicha lámpara y así tener luz propia.
texts.en:
Jaime is 34 years old and lives with his girlfriend in his own home. He has been working for a private company for the past eight years, and what he makes at his job allows him to cover some of his home expenses.

He is requesting this loan to buy a Salvasol lamp, which is a lamp that is charged with energy that comes from solar panels. They are used mainly in rural areas where homes lack electricity. That is why he is requesting this loan, so that he can by the lamp and have electrical power.

loans.use: to buy a solar lamp.

loans.name: Nary Grace

texts.en:
Nary Grace is 45 years old and married with four children, three of whom are in school. Nary Grace works very hard to provide for them.

She runs a general store in the Philippines and has requested a 42,000 PHP loan through NWTF to purchase additional stock like sardines, spices, etc. to sell.

Nary Grace has been in this business for 23 years.

In the future Nary Grace would like to save enough money so that she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase additional stock like sardines and spices to sell

loans.name: Claudia Yaneth

texts.es:
Con su gran empuje y perseverancia, Claudia ha salido adelante y ha podido educar y sostener a su numerosa familia conformada por 3 hijos y su esposo.

Siempre ha buscado la manera de obtener ingresos para su familia, tanto así que ha pasado por numerosos trabajos en el municipio de El Carmen De Viboral.

Hoy en día, después de haber decidido por su independencia, trabaja en la fabricación de artículos y objetos artesanales con alusión a la navidad. Esta es una gran oportunidad para Claudia, pues es una temporada muy buena para comercializar estos productos.

Por esta y muchas más razones solicita un préstamo para compra materia prima como madera, pinturas y pegas.

Con este préstamo podrá asegurar la sostenibilidad de su negocio y por ende de su familia.

Sueña con mejorar las condiciones de su vivienda a través de su negocio.

Si prestas a este crédito estarás aportando al progreso y empuje Colombiano!
texts.en:
With her great drive and perseverance, Claudia has gotten ahead and been able to educate and support her large family consisting of three children and her husband. She has always sought a way to earn an income for her family, so she has had a number of jobs in the city of Carmen de Viboral. Today, after deciding to work independently, she works making Christmas-themed handicrafts and objects. This is a great opportunity for Claudia, as it is a very good time of year to sell these products. 

For this and many other reasons, Claudia is asking for a loan to buy raw material like wood, paints and glue. With this loan she will be able to ensure the sustainability of her business and thus that of her family. She dreams about improving her living conditions through her business. If you lend to this loan, you are supporting Colombian progress and drive!

loans.use: to buy raw material like wood, paints and glue.

loans.name: Chamroeun's Group

texts.en: Chamroeun is 42 years old and a mother of two children living in Kampong Speu province. She earns income to support her family via rice farming. She can earn an income of about 18,600 KHR per year. For Chamroeun, this is her fifth loan cycle with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner) and she has fully repaid her past loans. In this group of six members, she is the group leader. She will spend her entire loan portion to buy a water filter. She hopes that her family will then have clean water to use.

loans.use: To buy a water filter.

location.town: Kampong Speu Province, Phnom Srouch District

loans.name: Pacita

texts.en:
Pacita is a 55-year-old married woman and a mother of two grown children. Pacita lives with her family in Leyte, Philippines. She runs a small sari-sari or retail store business selling various goods and items to the people in her community.
Pacita is asking for a loan to buy additional merchandise for her store such as canned goods, noodles, soda and beverages, soap and toiletries, condiments, rice, biscuits and snack foods. This loan will enable her to improve her stocks thus attracting more buyers to her store. 
In the future, Pacita hopes to make her business sustainable and productive.

loans.use: to buy additional merchandise for her store such as canned goods, noodles, soda and beverages, soap and toiletries, condiments, rice, biscuits and snack foods

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy groceries such as canned goods, noodles, and rice for her store, and dressed chicken and pork for food vending.

loans.name: Edgar Humberto

texts.es:
El trabajo del campo es una de las labores más difíciles hoy en día por el gran esfuerzo que se debe hacer para progresar, pero Edgar es un hombre que nunca se ha rendido a pesar del clima o las circunstancias que puedan pasar, el siempre está dispuesto a conseguir los recursos para su familia.

Se levanta desde primera hora de la mañana para desplazarse a distintas fincas para cumplir con obligaciones laborales. 

Este oficio lo alterna con la venta de leche que obtiene de sus propias vacas y adicional a esto tiene unos pequeños cultivos de plátano que también vende en la plaza de mercado.

El desea aumentar su capital de trabajo para garantizar el sostenimiento de sus negocios y es esta la razón que lo lleva a solicitar un préstamo para invertirlo en la compra de tres vacas.

Con este apoyo podrá mejorar su negocio y poco a poco cumplirá su sueño de comprar su propia vivienda y pagara la educación de sus hijos.

Edgar espera tu colaboración para mejorar su calidad de vida y la de sus hijos!
texts.en:
Farming is one of the hardest jobs there is nowadays, because it takes a lot of hard work to advance. But Edgar has never given up in spite of bad weather or whatever other obstacles may arise. He is always willing to find a way to provide for his family.

He gets up at first light to travel to different estates where he has work commitments. He alternates this job with his own milk sales. He has his own cows and also a small plantation where he grows plantains, which he also sells at the market square.

He wants to increase his working capital in order to secure his businesses' sustainability. That is why he is requesting a loan to invest in purchasing three more cows. This support will allow him to improve his business and little by little he will work towards achieving his dreams, which are to purchase a home and pay for his children's education.

Edgar is hoping for your cooperation in order to improve his and his children's quality of life!

loans.use: to buy three dairy cows.

loans.name: Ramona

texts.en:
Ramona is 59 years old and married with two children.

She works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 15,000 loan through NWTF to buy additional stock like coffee, milk, soap, etc. to sell.

Ramona has borrowed and repaid 12 loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for nine years and also earns an income from food vending.

She aspires to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy additional stock like coffee, milk, soap, etc. to sell.

loans.name: Maria Norelia

texts.es:
Maria, de 61 años, tiene muy claro que es lo que quiere para su vida y para la de su familia está decidida salir adelante con gran esfuerzo y dedicación.

Ella se desempeña como confeccionista de distintas prendas en contratación con terceros tales como pijamas, camisetas y ropa interior.

Esta actividad la inicio con el afán de buscar los recursos necesarios para el sostenimiento de sus hijos.

Es una mujer emprendedora y muy disciplinada, siempre en busca de oportunidades para progresar y mejorar como empresaria.

Ella solicita un crédito para comprar insumos de confección como tela, hilos y agujas.

De esta forma podría solventar todos sus gastos y podría tener esa vida plena que tanto ha soñado.

El negocio de Maria Necesita tu ayuda para salir adelante y progresar!
texts.en:
María is 61 years old. She is very clear about what she wants for her life and for her family. She is determined to move forward with great effort and dedication.

She works as a contract third-party seamstress, making different garments such as pajamas, t-shirts, and underwear. She started this activity with the ambition to find the necessary resources to sustain her children.

She is an enterprising and very disciplined woman who is always on the lookout for opportunities to progress and improve herself as a businesswoman.

She is requesting a loan to purchase sewing supplies such as fabric, thread, and needles so that she will be able to pay all her expenses and be able to have that full life that she has dreamed of so often.

María's business needs your help to move forward and make progress!

loans.use: to buy sewing supplies like fabric, thread, and needles

loans.name: Kamoljon

texts.ru: Камолчон молодой парень в возрасте 22 лет проживающий в сельской местности. Камолчон живет в многодетной семье, где родителям приходиться трудиться целыми днями чтобы обеспечить семью. Сам Камолчон с детства работает на поле наемным рабочим в свободное от школы время. Закончив школу Камолчон решил поступить в ВУЗ на экономический факультет но из за финансовых трудностей в семье его родители не в состоянии были дать ему достойное образование. Узнав что Арванд предоставляет кредит на образование он очень обрадовался и решил взять кредит на образование. Камолчон заранее благодарен организации за помощь малоимущим сельским жителям.
texts.en: Kamoljon is a young 22-year old man living in a rural area. He comes from a large family with many children, and his parents have to work  long hours in order to support the family. Kamoljon himself has been working as a seasonal agricultural worker from an early age on, whenever he had free time from school. After finishing secondary school, Kamoljon has decided to go to college and major in economics, but because of financial difficulties, his parents were unable to provide him with a proper education. Kamoljon was very glad to find out about Arvand's education loan and he decided to take out such a loan himself. Kamoljon thanks Arvand in advance for its help to low-income rural dwellers.

loans.use: to pay for college education.

loans.name: Hortencio

texts.pt:
Nasceu em Vilanculos Província de Inhambane tem 37 anos de idade vive maritalmente pai de 4 filhos dos quais 3 é que frequentam a escola, responsabiliza-se pelos seus pais.
Trabalha como florista “conta própria” a mais de 2 anos ande ganha um valor que aplica nas despesas da sua casa. Pois sendo florista os custos são maiores, dai ele solicita um empréstimo para ampliar o volume da sua produção adquirindo plantas. Este é o seu 1º empréstimo na hluvuku.
Futuramente pretende fazer uma floricultura mais desenvolvida com plantas híbritas e dar continuidade com os seus estudos até ao nível superior.
O seu maior desafio é a falta da água e medicamento para as suas plantas.
texts.en:
Hortencio comes from Vilanculos, province of Inhambane. He's 37 years old and married. He has four children, three of whom are in school. He's responsible for his parents.
He has worked as a self-employed florist for over two years and earns a profit which he uses for household expenses. Since being a florist increases his costs, he's requesting a loan so that he can stock up by purchasing plants. This is his first loan with Hluvuku.
In the future he intends to set up an improved flower shop with hybrid plants. He also intends to continue his studies up to university level.
His biggest challenge is the lack of water and medicine for his plants.

loans.use: to purchase plants.

loans.name: Michelle

texts.en:
Michelle is 30 years old and married with three children.

She works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and has requested a 12,000 PHP loan through NWTF to purchase additional stock like coffee, milk, sugar, etc. to sell.

Michelle has borrowed and paid three loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for five years and also earns an income from buying and selling bananas.

She aspires to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional stock like coffee, milk, and sugar to sell

loans.name: Rowela

texts.en:
Rowela is 43 years old, married, and has three children.

She works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a 30,000 PHP loan through NWTF to purchase additional inventory like soft drinks, biscuits, sardines, etc. to sell.

Rowela has borrowed and paid 18 loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for five years and also earns income from selling dressed chickens and from raising pigs.

She successfully repaid her previous loans, and now she has requested another loan to further build her businesses.

She aspires to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase soft drinks, biscuits, sardines, etc. to sell

loans.name: José Matias

texts.es:
José de 26 años de edad,  realizo 6º grado en la escuela, es padre de una hija de 5 años de edad, la esposa se dedica a oficios de su hogar,cuida de su hija y ademas tiene pollos indios de engorde,viven en casa propia.


José tiene ocho años  de trabajar en campo arreglado cercas de alambre y cuidando de ganado, esto lo aprendió cuando ya cumplió la mayoría de edad,se caso y se independizo.

El préstamo que esta solicitando a CREDICAMPO,  es para sacar la licencia de conducir.

El objetivo de José es  que su hija crezca bien y darles lo que ella necesita y tener las fuerzas para seguir trabajando junto a su esposa quien le apoya incondicionalmente,también cancelar las cuotas a tiempo.
texts.en:
José is 26 years old and has a sixth grade education. He has a five-year-old daughter and his wife tends to the home, takes care of their little girl, and also raises chickens. They live in their own home.

José has been working in the fields for the past eight years, repairing wire fencing and taking care of livestock. He learned the trade as an adult, when he got married and started living on his own.

He will use the loan he is requesting from CrediCampo to get his driver's license.

José's goal is to raise his daughter well and give her everything she needs. He wants to have the strength to keep working alongside his wife, who supports him unconditionally. He also wants to make his payments on time.

loans.use: to get his driver's license.

loans.name: Odongerel

texts.en:
Odongerel, 37 years old, lives with her two daughters in Darkhan, the second largest city of Mongolia. Her husband has been working in Korea on labor contract since 2010. She works as a machinist at a water research institution. Their daughters both go to high school. 

She is requesting a loan of 2,500,000 MNT to buy a closet, chest of drawers, television and sofa in order to create a comfortable living environment. Just two years ago, her family moved into an apartment without any furniture. The borrower is a very hardworking individual who strives for a better future.

loans.use: to buy furniture

loans.name: Maria Pilar

texts.es: Maria de 50 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposo, ella se dedica desde hace 7 años a la crianza de pollos y gallinas, comercializa sus productos en los diferentes mercados que se encuentran cerca de su casa, ella esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de concentrado y vitaminas para continuar con su trabajo que le genera buenas ganancias.
texts.en: Maria is 50 years old and lives in her own home with her husband.  For seven years Maria has made a living raising chickens and hens.  She sells her products in different markets located close to her home.  She is requesting a loan to buy chicken feed and vitamins to continue her work, which generates good profits.

loans.use: to buy chicken feed and vitamins

loans.name: Momad

texts.pt:
Momade nasceu em Maxi-xe província de Inhambane tem 29 anos de idade é casado oficialmente é pai de 1 filha menor de idade, não responsabiliza−se por ninguém. 
É proprietário de um estaleiro onde ganha um valor que aplica nas despesas da sua casa. Com este empréstimo pretende adquirir material de construção para a venda  como: cimento, varões e área grossa. O mesmo tem como seu maior sonho ter uma empresa para fabrico de  paves e módulos para muro de vedação. Tem como seu maior desafio ampliar o seu negocio.
texts.en:
Momade comes from Maxixe, province of Inhambane. He's 29 years old and officially married, and he has an underage daughter. He's not responsible for anybody.
He owns a supply yard from where he earns a profit which he uses for household expenses. With this loan he intends to purchase construction supplies such as cement, rods and coarse gravel for selling. His biggest dream is to own a company that manufactures glass blocks and units for fence walls. His biggest challenge is expanding his business.

loans.use: to purchase construction supplies such as cement, rods and coarse gravel for selling.

loans.name: Aida

texts.en:
Aida's dream of improving the quality of life for her four children's future led her to engage in multiple source of income.  She has tried food vending, cosmetic retailing, and now manicure and pedicure services. She earns an average of PHP 1,000 a week from these services. 

She became a GDMPC member recently, and she has requested a loan to buy materials for manicure and pedicure services, so as to make her customers loyal to her services.

His dream is to acquire a store, besides her beauty parlor shop, with its own roof to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy materials for manicure and pedicure services, so as to make her customers loyal to her services

loans.name: Gonzalo De Jesus

texts.es:
Gonzalo de 46 años, vive en unión libre y tiene dos hijos, desde hace 1 año tiene una tienda de abarrotes  la cual atiende en compañía de su esposa. 

Tiene como sueño ampliar su tienda donde distribuye artículos como leche, granos, verduras, lácteos y otros. 

En la actualidad tiene poco surtido y esto es perjudicial ya que no puede suplir con muchos productos que le pide su clientela. 

Gonzalo, en vista de esto, optó en solicitar un préstamo con el fin de organizarse más y comprar al por mayor el surtido necesario (granos, azúcar, galletería, lácteos) para incrementar su oferta y poder brindar mejor atención a las personas,  esto le representaría también el aumento en sus ingresos para cumplir necesidades básicas de su hogar.

Anímate a prestar al negocio de Gonzalo!
texts.en:
Gonzalo is 46 years old. He is in a common-law marriage and has two children. For the past year he has been running a grocery store alongside his wife. He sells items like milk, grains, vegetables, dairy products, and other items, but currently his stock is low. This is detrimental for his business, since he is not able to supply his customers with many items they demand.

In sight of this, Gonzalo has decided to request a loan in order to be more organized and purchase what he needs wholesale: grains, sugar, cookies, dairy products, etc. This will increase his stock and enable him to serve his customers better. It will also mean an increase in his income, which will help him cover his household expenses. His goal is to expand his business.

Go for it and lend to Gonzalo's business!

loans.use: to buy wholesale products for his store.

loans.name: Akuvi

texts.fr: AKUVI est une jeune veuve de 34 ans. Elle habite le quartier Nyékonakpoè avec ses trois enfants. Elle a débuté la vente des pagnes depuis 2011. Pour satisfaire les besoins permanents de sa clientèle et diversifier ses produits, AKUVI sollicite un crédit pour acheter 05 pièces de pagnes. Ce crédit lui permettra également d’augmenter son chiffre d’affaire et de s’occuper des besoins de ses enfants qui constituent une charge pour elle seule.
texts.en: AKUVI is a young, 34-year-old widow. She lives in the Nyékonakpoè neighborhood with her three children. She has been selling pagnes (traditional wrap-arounds) since 2011. In order to satisfy the constant needs of her clientele and to diversify her products, AKUVI is seeking a loan to buy 5 pieces of pagnes. This loan will also allow her to increase her business numbers and to take care of her children’s needs, which falls on her alone.

loans.use: to buy 5 pieces of pagnes

loans.name: Saniata

texts.en:
Saniata is 48 years old and married, with five children, one of whom is in school.  She works very hard to provide for them.

She runs a general store in the Philippines, and she has requested a PHP 12,000 loan through NWTF to buy additional stocks like soft drinks, sugar, rice, etc., to sell.

Saniata has been in this business for seven years.

In the future Saniata would like to build and expand her business to secure the financial stability of her family.

loans.use: to buy additional stocks like soft drinks, sugar, rice, etc., to sell

loans.name: Narcisio

texts.pt:
Nasceu em Vilanculos Província de Inhambane tem 30 anos de idade vive maritalmente pai de 2 filhos menores de idade, todos frequentam escola, responsabiliza-se pela sua mãe e irmã que se encontram em sua casa. 
Trabalha na empresa de águas a mais de 8 anos onde ganha valor que aplica nas despesas da sua casa. Com empréstimo solicitado pretende aumentar o volume do seu negócio de criação de frangos adquirindo ração, pintos e vitaminas. Este é o seu 2º empréstimo na Hluvuku.
Futuramente pretende terminar a sua obra de residência, contrair matrimónio e garantir o ensino dos seus filhos.
texts.en:
Narcisio comes from Vilanculos, province of Inhambane. He's 30 years old and married. He has two underage children who are in school. He's responsible for his mother and sister who live with him.
He has worked for a water company for over 8 years and earns an income which he uses for household expenses. With the requested loan he intends to stock his chicken farm by purchasing feed, chicks and vitamins. This is his second loan with Hluvuku.
In the future he intends to finish building his house, get married and provide an education for his children.

loans.use: to stock his chicken farm by purchasing feed, chicks and vitamins.

loans.name: Carlos Alfonso

texts.es: Don Carlos gracias a su esfuerzoy dedicación al trabajo del cultivo ha salido adelante junto a su familia, en la actualidad tiene cosechada 2 y 1/2 manzana de Piña Monte lirio, 3/4 manzana de plátano y frijoles y maíz, el solicita el crédito para la compra de fertilizantes, abonos para limpiar y abonar todos estos siembro, muy agradecido con el apoyo que recibe de fondos Kiva y Afodenic ya que con los créditos anteriores igualmente a trabajado sus cultivos y con las ganancias obtenidas a mejorado su vida ya que a realizado construcciones en su vivienda, el espera seguir trabajando y recibir siempre el apoyo que se le habrindado
texts.en: Thanks to Carlos' effort and dedication to his work growing crops he has been successful with his family. Today he has grown 2.5 blocks of pineapple, .75 block of banana, beans, and corn. He seeks a loan to buy fertilizers and manure to clean and fertilize his crops. He is very thankful for the support he receives from funds from Kiva and Afodenic as his previous loans have also provided funds to work with his crops and the profits obtained improve his life and he has completed construction on his home. He hopes to be able to continue working and always receive the support that has been provided to him.

loans.use: to maintain his crops by buying fertilizer and manure..

loans.name: Rafael

texts.pt:
Nasceu na Beira Província de Sofala tem 53 anos de idade, vive maritalmente pai de 3 filhos maiores de idade todos frequentam a escola, não responsabiliza-se por ninguém.
É segurança a mais de 8 anos onde aufere um valor que aplica nas despesas da sua casa. Com valor solicitado pretende aumentar o volume do seu negócio adquirindo roupa usada para venda no mercado informal vulgo shoprite. Este é o seu 4º empréstimo na Hluvuku. 
Futuramente pretende adquirir uma viatura para assegurar seu negócio e garantir o ensino dos seus filhos até ao nível superior
texts.en:
Rafael comes from Beira, province of Sofala. He's 53 years old and married. He has three adult children who are in school. He's not responsible for anyone.
He has worked as a security guard for over 8 years and earns an income which he uses for household expenses. With the requested amount he intends to stock his business by purchasing used clothing for selling at the informal market known as shoprite. This is his 4th loan with Hluvuku.
In the future he intends to buy a vehicle to improve his business. He also intends to provide an education for his children up to university level.

loans.use: to purchase used clothing for selling at the informal market known as shoprite.

loans.name: Luis Daniel

texts.es:
Luis es un joven muy emprendedor y con muchas ganas de salir adelante y progresar.

Desde hace 2 años se viene dedicando a la venta de productos como ropa, accesorios, artículos de belleza y elementos para el hogar, es una actividad que inicio por gusto a la comercialización además de ser una muy buena opción para obtener recursos para su familia.

Desde siempre sintió gran afinidad con el comercio y las ventas, por lo que hoy en día tiene grandes habilidades en este campo gracias a su simpatía y excelente calidad de servicio.

Solicita un préstamo para comprar surtido de productos de belleza y ropa para aumentar su inventario y mejorar sus ventas.

Tiene la esperanza de poder salir adelante y abrir un local gracias al apoyo de las personas de buen corazón que apoyan este tipo de proyectos.

Presta y aporta hoy, anímate!
texts.en:
Luis is an enterprising young man with a great desire to get ahead and improve himself. For two years now, he's made a living selling clothes, accessories, beauty products, and household items. 

He began this work because he has always enjoyed commerce and selling, and he has great ability given his friendliness and excellent service orientation. It is also a very good option to obtain resouces for his family.  

He is requesting a loan to buy an assortment of beauty products and clothing. He will increase his stock and improve his sales. 

He's hoping to be able to succeed and open a store, thanks to the help of good-hearted people who support this type of projects.

Get inspired to help today.

loans.use: to buy an assortment of beauty products and clothing.

loans.name: Romulo

texts.en:
Romulo is 49 years old and is raising his family in a rural community. 

Aside from being a farmer, he also manages a small welding shop in their village to have an additional source of income. He aims to improve his business and make it profitable  in order to sustain the necessities of his family. 

Due to capital insufficiency, he is asking for a loan of PHP 5,000.00 to buy welding rod, paints, and other materials needed in his welding shop. 

Having this financial assistance, Romulo believes that someday, he will further improve his business.

loans.use: to buy welding rod, paints, and other materials needed in his welding shop

location.town: Brgy. Almaguer North, Bambang, Nueva Vizcaya

loans.name: Raul

texts.pt:
Nasceu em Goba-Namaacha Província de Maputo tem 27 anos de idade, vive maritalmente pai de 3 filhos menores de idade, apenas 1 frequenta a escola, responsabiliza-se pelo seu avô que vive em sua casa. 
Trabalha na Sociedade de Águas como verificador das linhas de água a mais de 8 anos onde aufere  um valor que aplica nas despesas da casa. Com o valor solicitado pretende dar continuidade a sua obra de construção de dependências para aluguer adquirindo material de construção como: areia, cimento, pedras e outros que forem necessários. 
Futuramente pretende terminar o seu projecto de construção de dependências e iniciar um negócio de venda de produtos da 1ª necessidade. O seu maior desafio é ser grande empresário.
texts.en:
Raul comes from Goba-Namaacha, province of Maputo. He's 27 years old and married. He has three underage children, only one of whom is is school. He's responsible for his grandfather who lives with him.
He has worked as a water meter reader for a water company for over 8 years, and he earns an income which he uses for household expenses. With the requested amount he intends to continue building rooms for renting out. For that he'll purchase construction supplies such as sand, cement, rocks and other items that are needed.
In the future he intends to finish his room building project and start a business selling products that are household staples. His biggest challenge is becoming a big business owner.

loans.use: to purchase construction supplies such as sand, cement, rocks and other items that are needed.

loans.name: Munkh-Orgil

texts.en:
Munkh-Orgil, who is 27 years old, lives with his wife in Ulaanbaatar, capital city of Mongolia. He has been working as sales manager since 2011. His wife sells cosmetics over the counter at the trade center. 

They are currently living in a Mongolian traditional ger (a portable felt dwelling) on a plot of land.  He is requesting a loan of MNT 4,000,000 to buy building materials, such as fiberglass, felt, and a hardwood floor, in order to renovate his home before winter. 

After renovation, he and his wife will live in comfortable, warm place, where less coal is burned for heating, releasing fewer pollutants into air.

loans.use: to renovate his home before winter

loans.name: Zito

texts.pt:
Nasceu em Namaacha Província de Maputo tem 32 anos de idade, vive maritalmente pai de 3 filhos menores de idade apenas 2 é que frequentam a escola, não responsabiliza-se por ninguém.
É proprietário de um estabelecimento comercial onde ganha um valor que aplica nas despesas da sua casa. Com o valor solicitado pretende aumentar o volume do seu negócio de venda de produtos da 1ª necessidade como: arroz, açúcar, farinha de milho e outros que forem necessários. Este é o seu 2º empréstimo na Hluvuku.
Futuramente pretende adquirir uma viatura para o transporte publico e garantir o ensino dos seus filhos até ao nível superior
texts.en:
Zito comes from Namaacha, province of Maputo. He's 32 years old and married. He has three underage children, only two of whom are in school. He's not responsible for anybody.
He owns a store where he earns a profit which he uses for household expenses. With the requested amount he intends to increase turnover in his business. He sells products that are household staples such as rice, sugar, cornflour and other items that are needed. This is his second loan with Hluvuku.
In the future he intends to buy a vehicle for public transportation and provide an education for his children up to university level.

loans.use: to purchase rice, sugar, cornflour and other items that are needed.

loans.name: Sunshine

texts.en:
Sunshine works hard to support her family. She is married and has a business, buying and selling dressed chickens, in the Philippines.

She requested a PHP 13,000 loan through NWTF. She will use the loan to purchase additional boxes of dressed chickens to sell. Sunshine has been in this business for two years.

In the future, she would like to save money, to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase additional boxes of dressed chickens to sell.

loans.name: Jonathan José

texts.es:
Jonathan tiene 27 años de edad, actualmente vive en compañía de su madre y sus tres hermanos, desde hace algunos días sufrió la perdida de su padre; y su madre ha asumido la responsabilidad para sacar adelante a sus hijos. Menciona que el perder a un ser querido desestabiliza a una familia, es por eso que con la muerte de su padre sus ánimos de seguir estudiando se vieron afectados ya que la situación económica cambio a todos.
Se considera un joven aplicado, con espíritu emprendedor con el interés de adquirir nuevos conocimientos en las diferentes áreas y etapas de su vida. 
Su motivación inicial hoy en día es compensar el sacrificio que realizan sus padres y ahora su madre.
Jonathan desea contribuir al desarrollo del país a través de sus conocimientos y habilidades en el área de arquitectura, fortaleciendo la imagen de Honduras. "EL DINERO TE LIMITA PERO LA NECESIDAD TE IMPULSA A LUCHAR POR LO QUE QUIERES"  
En un futuro Jonathan desea convertirse en un exitoso empresario brindando nuevas oportunidades de empleo en la creación de un complejo empresarial.
texts.en:
Jonathan is 27 years old. Today he lives with his mother and three siblings; only a few days ago he suffered the loss of his father and his mother has assumed responsibility for supporting the children. He mentions that losing a loved one is destabilizing to a family, and with the death of his father he desire to continue studying was impacted as the family's economic situation changed for everyone.

He considers himself an applied young man, with an entrepreneurial spirit with an interest in acquiring new knowledge in different areas and stages of life. His motivation today is to make up for the sacrifice his parents have made, and now his mother. Jonathan wishes to contribute to the development of his country through his knowledge and abilities in the area of architecture, thus strengthening the image of Honduras. "Money is limiting but necessity pushes you to fight for what you want."

In the future Jonathan wishes to become a successful businessman providing new opportunities for employment in the creation of a business enterprise.

loans.use: to pay for university studies in architecture.

loans.name: Rufino

texts.pt:
Senhor Rufino tem 49 anos de idade, é casado e pai de dois filhos, frenquentando o ensino secundário, é veterinário, vive em casa própria com a sua familia a qual ele sustenta.
O montante financiado será aplicado para a compra de cimento, chapas, barrotes, para dar continuidade a construção da sua casa.
Para o futuro pretende criar frangos e patos em grandes quantidades pois intende melhor de animais espera ter sucessos visto que já fez ensaios  de criação em poucas quantidades.
Um dos grandes desafios é a aquisição de meio de ,transporte para se locomover da casa para o serviço visto que ultimamente e dificel chegar a tempo no serviço andando de  semicolectivo.
texts.en:
Rufino is 49 years old and married. He has two children who are in high school. He's a veterinarian and lives in a house that he owns. He supports and lives with his family.
The requested amount will be used to purchase cement, plates and beams, so he can continue building his house.
In the future he intends to start a large-scale chicken and duck farm. Since he's knowledgeable about animals, he hopes to be successful, because he has already raised them on a small scale on a trial basis.
One of his challenges is acquiring a means of transportation in order to commute from home to work, since lately it's been hard to arrive in time for work by taking the bus.

loans.use: to purchase cement, plates and beams, so he can continue building his house.

loans.name: Maria Magdalena

texts.es: María de 50 años de edad habita en vivienda propia desde hace algunos años, por lo que es muy reconocida en su cantón por ser una mujer trabajadora, y junto a ella habita su hijo de 21 años de edad que le apoya con los gastos de su hogar. Ella siempre ha sabido ganarse la vida, por lo que todos los días recorre las calles de su municipio ofreciendo una gran variedad de prendas de vestir desde hace más de 20 años. María desea adquirir un crédito con FUSAI para invertir en: lámina galvanizada, madera y clavos para cambiar el techo de su vivienda, ya que actualmente se encuentra deteriorado, por lo que espera obtener este crédito lo antes posible para evitar que sus pertenencias se deterioren por las filtraciones.
texts.en: María is 50 years old and has lived in her own home for some years. She is known in her region for being a hard-working woman. Her 21 year old son lives with her and supports her with the household expenses. She has always known how to earn a living. Every day for 20 years she has walked the streets of the municipality offering a large variety of clothing. Maria wishes to acquire a loan from FUSAI to invest in galvanized laminate, wood, and nails to change the roof of her home as today her roof is deteriorating, so she wishes to obtain this loan as soon as possible to avoid that her belongings be damaged by the water leaks..

loans.use: to invest in galvanized laminate, wood, and nails to change the roof of her home.

loans.name: Lea

texts.en:
Lea earns income from their banana farm, in addition to her piggery. Her previous loan, which she used for buying feed for her pigs, has been repaid successfully.

Recently, in order to improve her farm, she took a new loan from GDMPC. She will use the new loan to purchase new planting materials, including organic fertilizer. She expects this purchase to result in a more productive banana farm. She hopes to gain more profit, and she plans to save a portion of it for the future education of her child.

loans.use: to purchase new planting materials, including organic fertilizer, so that her banana farm will become more productive.

loans.name: John Henry

texts.es:
John desde muy joven se dedico a las funciones del campo tales como agricultura y ganadería, actividades que le enseño su padre para que saliera adelante en su vida.

Hoy en día su actividad principal es la agricultura y la ganadería y tiene como objetivo mejorar su capital comprando dos terneros que le permitan abastecerse y generar mejores ingresos, y esta es la razón por la cual solicita un préstamo.

Es padre responsable y amoroso con su hijo, vive en una finca con el y su esposa quien ha sido su más grande compañía.

Sueña con poder otorgarle a su hijo una educación de calidad para que más adelante se pueda defender solo y sea independiente.

Todos los días asiste su negocio y procura por hacer las cosas muy bien.

Si prestas al crédito de John podrás impactar su vida y su familia de una manera muy positiva, anímate!
texts.en:
Since he was very young, John has dedicated himself to work in the fields such as agriculture and raising cattle, activities his father taught him so that he'd be able to get ahead in life. Today his primary business is agriculture and raising cattle, and he has the objective of improving his capital by buying calves, which will allow him to build up his herd and generate better earnings. This is why he is asking for a loan.

John is a responsible and affectionate father with his son. He lives on a farm with his son and his wife, who has been his greatest companion. He dreams of being able to give his son a quality education so that he'll be able to defend himself and be independent in the future.

John attends to his business every day and seeks to do things very well. If you loan to John, you will be able to his life and his family in a very positive manner. Go ahead!

loans.use: to buy two calves to improve his cattle production

loans.name: Sambath's Group

texts.en:
Sambath’s group lives in a rural village in Phnom Penh province in Cambodia. 

Sambath makes a living cultivating rice, and he also does extra work as tailor to support his family. 

In their village there is no reliable access to safe, clean drinking water. Having a water filter at home will help each member of the group to safeguard the health of their families, save money on medical expenses, and save time collecting fuel and boiling water.

loans.use: To buy a water filter to provide safe drinking water for his family.

loans.name: Pedro

texts.pt:
Senhor Pedro tem 58 anos de idade, é casado e pai de sete filhos dos quais sustenta quatro filhos frenquentando ensino primário e secundário respectivamente, é pedreiro conta própria e segurança numa empresa privada, vive em casa própria com a sua familia.
O montante financiado será aplicado para a compra de cimento, areia, porta, arros de janelas para dar a continuidade a construção de uma dependência.
Sendo pedreiro no futuro espera construir pessoalmente depências para o arrendamento como forma de aumentar a renda familiar.
O seu maior desafio é de manter o bom nome na instituição liquidando os empréstimos sem entrar em mora.
texts.en:
Pedro is 58 years old and married. He has seven children and he supports four of them who are in primary and secondary school. He's a self-employed mason and also a security guard for a private company. He lives with his family in a house that he owns.
The requested amount will be used to purchase cement, sand, a door, and window frames so he can continue building an additional room.
Being a mason, in the future he hopes to personally build rooms for renting out as a way of improving his family's income.
His biggest challenge is keeping up his good name with the institution by repaying the loans without delinquency.

loans.use: to purchase cement, sand, a door, and window frames so he can continue building an additional room.

loans.name: Evelyn Fryda

texts.es:
Evelyn es una mujer de 32 años de edad, soltera, tiene dos hijos de seis y otro de ocho años de edad, y su negocio es la venta de lentes de aumento y monturas.
Ella es buena madre, responsable, trabajadora, paciente y comprometida con su trabajo. Su negocio lo realiza en la zona de ‘El Tejar’ un área caracterizada por el comercio informal en todas las áreas; cientos de comerciante se acomodan lado a lado para ofertar ropa, comida, carnes, frutas, etc. de clima frio y seco durante todo el año.
Evelyn es de tez morena, cabello negro largo, estatura mediana, usa lentes de aumento, su lengua materna es el aymará y habla español para el comercio. su vida la realiza junto a sus dos hijos que estudian en la escuela, viven en una casa alquilada que cuenta con agua potable y electricidad. Su negocio es la venta de gafas, también conocidas como lentes, anteojos o espejuelos y Se usan principalmente para compensar defectos de la vista, tales como la miopía, el astigmatismo o la hipermetropía, aunque también vende gafas especiales para proteger a los ojos en actividades en las que exista un riesgo para éstos , ‘mi tienda es bastante conocida, porque los productos que ofrecemos son de buena calidad y ayudan a las personas…’. Su sueño es ampliar su negocio para atender a mayor cantidad de clientes, y desea realizar la compra por mayor de diferentes tipos de lentes para la venta en su tienda. Esta es la primera secuencia de préstamos con la institución en 5 años que viene realizando esta actividad.
Es por esos motivos que Evelyn solicita un préstamo para la compra de lentes de todo tipo por mayor para la venta en su tienda y ayudar a sus clientes a ver mejor.
texts.en:
Evelyn is a 32-year-old single woman with two children; one is six and one is eight years old.  Her store sells of eyeglasses and frames.  She is a good mother, responsible, hard-working, patient, and dedicated to her work.  

Her business is in the "El Tejar" zone, an area characterized by informal trade.  Hundreds of shopkeepers are located side-by-side to sell clothing, food, meats, fruits, etc. The climate is cold and dry year-round.  Evelyn has brown complexion, long black hair, medium height, and uses eyeglasses.  Her first language is Aymara, and she speaks Spanish for business.  She lives with her two children who study in school.  They live in a rented house with potable water and electricity.  

Her business sells eyeglasses, which go by many names, but are principally used to compensate for vision defects such as near-sightedness, astigmatism or far-sightedness.  She also sells special glasses to protect eyes during activities that put eyes at risk for such defects.  "My store is very well-known, because the products we offer are of good quality, and help people."  

Her dream is to expand her business to serve a higher quantity of customers, as well as buy different types of lenses in bulk for the store. This is the institution's first loan in five years for this type of business.  It is for these reasons that Evelyn is requesting a loan to buy all types of glasses in bulk to sell in her store and help her customers to see better.

loans.use: to buy many types of glasses for her store and to help her customers see better

loans.name: Ha

texts.en:
Hà operates a food stall selling sea food. She has been involved in this business for 5 years. She is 33 years old and she is married with 4 children. She lives and works in Hau Loc district, a rural area in Thanh Hoa province

This is Hà's first loan with Thanh Hoa Fund of Poor Women. 

The main hardship that Hà faces in her life is not having a hygienic latrine. She is requesting a loan to purchase sand, cement and bricks to build a toilet.

In the future, Hà hopes for her family to be healthy and happy, to build a new house, and for her business to do well.

loans.use: to purchase sand, cement and bricks to build a toilet

loans.name: Pelita

texts.en:
Pelita is a businesswoman from Leyte, Philippines. She is married and has four children. Pelita owns a small sari-sari (or variety store) in her place. She has operated this store for more than 10 years. This is the source of her income.

Pelita is asking for a loan to buy more stock for her store, like canned goods, noodles, soda and beverages, soap and toiletries, biscuits and snack foods, rice and condiments. This loan will help Pelita improve her inventory, which will attract more buyers into her store.

In the future, Pelita hopes to expand her store, so that she can serve more customers and augment her income. She also wants to save extra money to pay the school expenses of her children.

loans.use: to buy more stock for her store, like canned goods, noodles, soda and beverages, soap and toiletries, biscuits and snack foods, rice and condiments.

loans.name: Marcelina

texts.en:
Marcelina is 46 years old. She hails from Baybay, Leyte. She is married to a fisherman, and sometimes her husband also works as a carpenter. Together, they have three children, ages 10 - 18. While her husband works, Marcelina also involves herself in a retail business. She sells items like clothes, fresh fish, dried fish, and 'tinabal' (brined fish -- the fish is cleaned and placed in a container with a lot of salt). Filipinos love this food and usually fry tinabal or dried fish, with rice, for breakfast.

Marcelina seems to have been born with the skill to sell any item for a profit, but she continues to support their fishing business, as well. She is asking for a loan to buy a fishing boat and fishing nets. This will pave the way for them to have better productivity and to increase their catch.

In the future, Marcelina dreams of having a Sonar Sensor for fishing. Her income will be for her children's schooling and healthy meals for her family.

loans.use: to buy a fishing boat and fishing nets.

loans.name: Jorge Alberto

texts.es: Jorge de 31 años de edad vive en casa propia con su grupo familiar, el se dedica a la venta de llantas usadas y reparación de vehículos desde hace 15 años, con lo que obtiene de su trabajo logra salir adelante, el esta solicitando un credito para la compra de llantas y repuestos para vehiculos todo por mayor para poder continuar con su trabajo y asi tener mejores ingresos.
texts.en: Jorge is 31-years-old and lives in his own home with his family.  He has made a living selling used tires and repairing vehicles for 15 years.  With what he makes from this work, he is able to get ahead.  He is requesting a loan to purchase tires and vehicle spare parts in bulk to be able to continue his work and have better profits.

loans.use: to buy tires and spare parts for vehicles.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a toolbox.

loans.name: Mario

texts.es:
Mario está estudiando la Carrera de Contaduría, comenta que aun vive con sus padres y su objetivo principal es algún día ser un buen  profesional que sirva a la sociedad en el ámbito de la contabilidad.
También quiere  hacer conocer a las personas de que se trata esta carrera; también tener un buen trabajo para poder ayudar a su familia.
Pide este préstamo para poder pagar su matricula.
texts.en:
Mario is studying for a degree in Accounting. He says that he lives with his parents and his main goal is to become a successful professional someday so that he can serve society in the field of accounting.

Mario would also like to get to know people who are in the accounting field. In addition, he hopes to have a good job so that he can help his family.

He is requesting this loan so that he can pay his tuition.

loans.use: to pay his university tuition.

loans.name: Arcelito

texts.en:
Arcelito, a 46-year-old, married man with eight children, operates a piggery to make a living. For over ten years, it has been his way of earning income for the family. He repaid successfully his previous loan, which he had used for this business.

To expand the business, Arcelito took a new loan to buy additional piglets and feed. He plans to raise more pigs to sell. In the future, he wants to expand his piggery even more, by having more piglets, to earn more income .

loans.use: to buy additional piglets and feed, and raise more pigs to sell.

loans.name: Janice

texts.en:
Janice is 25 years old and married. She was blessed with two children and is currently living in a rural community. 

While she takes care of her children, she engages herself in cooking short order snacks within their community. She aims to offer more snack recipes to her customers but she doesn't have enough capital. 

For this reason, she would like to access financial assistance of PHP 5,000 to buy  seasonings, vegetables, meat and other ingredients she needs to cook and sell. 

Through this financial assistance, she believes that someday, she will further improve her business.

loans.use: to buy  seasonings, vegetables, meat, and other ingredients to make snacks to sell

location.town: Brgy. Almaguer North, Bambang, Nueva Vizcaya

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more stock to sell such as rice, biscuits, snack foods, noodles, soap, toiletries, canned goods, condiments, coffee and beverages

loans.name: Mariannel

texts.en:
Mariannel is a 25-year-old married woman from Baybay, Leyte. She has two children, ages two and seven. For two years, she has owned a sari-sari (variety) store business to support her family. However, she needs to repair her store after the typhoon. She is asking for a loan to buy materials to rebuild her store, such as hard wood, and to buy merchandise such as beverages, rice, soft drinks, seasonings and toiletries to restock her store.  

It is part of her priority to send her children to school. In the future, she hopes to build a bigger store.

loans.use: to buy materials to rebuild her store, such as hard wood, and to buy merchandise such as beverages, rice, soft drinks, seasonings and toiletries

loans.name: Anelyn

texts.en:
Anelyn is 26 and has three children. She helps her husband in their farm and has been doing this for over three years. Aside from this, they also have a cosmetic retailing business to earn a living. 

Recently, she took a new loan to purchase fertilizer and pay weeding maintenance costs for her farm to have a greener farm. 

Believing in the essence of helping each other and determination makes Anelyn a better entrepreneur who is determined to improve their way of living.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer and pay weeding maintenance costs for her farm to have a greener farm.

loans.name: Mary Grace

texts.en:
As a married parent of two children, Mary Grace works hard to support her family.

She has a food vending business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from buying and selling ready-to-wear clothes. Mary Grace is borrowing PHP 14,000 through NWTF to buy ingredients for her food vending business.

Mary Grace has been sustaining her business activities through her past four loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for her food production business.

loans.name: Miriam

texts.en:
Miriam is a married woman with two children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. Miriam is 26 years old and has one child who is currently in school.

She has a buy-and-sell scrap materials business in the Philippines. Miriam requested a PHP 20,000 loan amount through NWTF to purchase more scrap materials to sell.

Miriam has been in this business for three years. She would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to purchase more scrap materials to sell

loans.name: Maribeth

texts.en: Maribeth is married with five children. She has been helping her husband working on their own farm to make a living. Her previous loan used for farming had been repaid successfully. To improve her farm, she took a new loan recently to purchase organic fertilizer to have a more productive farm. In the future, she wants to make improvements to her house and to improve the general living conditions of her family.

loans.use: to purchase organic fertilizer to have a more productive farm

loans.name: Melojane

texts.en:
Melojane's cafeteria had been improving after taking her previous loan used for the business. She offers more viands and snacks to her customers and is earning well from this. 

She successfully repaid her previous loan. To expand her offerings, she took a new loan to buy additional raw ingredients to prepare food to sell as well as additional utensils to cater to her increasing number of customers. She is aiming to develop her business and increase her profits.

loans.use: to buy additional raw ingredients to prepare food to sell as well as additional utensils to cater to her increasing number of customers.

loans.name: Roberta

texts.en:
Roberta works hard to support her family. She is married and has a fruit and vegetable vending business in the Philippines, and has been in this business for 30 years now.

She requested a PHP 15,000 loan through NWTF to buy more fruits and vegetables to sell to her customers. In the future, Roberta would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy more fruits and vegetables to sell to her customers.

loans.name: Elma

texts.en:
Elma is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a buy-and-sell used clothing business in the Philippines. She has been in this business for 1 year and she earns more income from food vending.

She has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts with the help of the loans from NWTF. Elma is borrowing PHP 13,000 through NWTF to buy additional stock of used clothing for her business.

She dreams to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college in the future.

loans.use: to buy additional stock of used clothing.

loans.name: Marina

texts.en:
Marina is 38 years old and married with two children currently in school.  She works very hard to provide for them.

She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to buy additional items like coffee, milk, juice, canned goods, biscuits, sugar, etc., to sell.

Marina has been in this business for two years and sells a variety of items. In the future, she would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy additional items like coffee, milk, juice, canned goods, biscuits, sugar, etc., to sell

loans.name: Roselie

texts.en:
As a married parent of five children, Roselie works hard to support her family.

She has a general store business in the Philippines and also earns additional income from food vending and raising livestock. Roselie is borrowing PHP 30,000 through NWTF to buy items such as shampoo, groceries, etc. to sell in her general store business.

She successfully repaid her previous loan, and now she has requested another loan to further build her business.

Roselie has been sustaining her business activities through her past 24 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy items to sell such as shampoo, groceries, etc.

loans.name: Maria Doris

texts.es:
María de 47 años de edad, está casada y tiene 3 hijos de 20, 24 y 26 años de edad, todos independientes. María no estudio, sus padres nunca se interesaron en meterla a una escuela y mejor le enseñaron a trabajar. Su esposo es jornalero y solo él vive con ella.

María es comerciante, tiene su propio negocio de venta de tortillas en el que vende todos los días de 6:00 am a 2:00 pm, con este y la ayuda de su esposo lograron crecer a sus hijos; ella comenta que siempre le gusto ser independiente y ganar su propio dinero.
 
El préstamo será utilizado para pagar los gastos de graduación de su hija, terminó la universidad y necesita el dinero para estar solvente con la misma. María espera que su otros hijos terminen sus estudios y contar siempre con el apoyo de la institución.
texts.en:
María is 47 years old, married, and has 3 children ages 20, 24, and 26 years old, all of who are independent. Maria didn't go to school as her parents never enrolled her in school and better they taught her to work. Her husband is a day laborer and only he lives with Maria. Maria is a businesswoman. She has her own business selling tortillas, which she sells every day from 6:00 AM to 2:00 PM. Her husband helps her and the two of them were able to raise their children.

The loan will be used to pay their daughter's graduation expenses as she competed her university studies and needs money to pay for graduation. Maria hopes that all her children finish their schooling and that she can always count on the support of the institution.

loans.use: to pay for her daughter's graduation expenses.

loans.name: Carolina

texts.en:
Carolina is 51 years old and married with five children. With two children in school, Carolina works very hard to provide for them.

Carolina runs a general store in the Philippines and has requested a loan of 11,000 PHP through NWTF to purchase items to sell like canned goods, beverages, and groceries. Carolina has been in this business for 33 years. 

In the future, Carolina would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase items to sell like canned goods, beverages, and groceries

loans.name: Phal

texts.en:
Phal is a 55-year-old widowed mother who lives with a daughter, a son-in-law, and five grandchildren in Kampong Speu province of Cambodia. 

For earning a living, she buys recyclable junk to resell, earning $8 per day. Now Phal would like to request a loan to buy bricks, cement ,and wood to renovate her house and build a toilet. This loan will provide her and her family with better living conditions. 

For her future, she wants to help support all of her grandchildren to finish high school.

loans.use: to request a loan to buy bricks, cement, and wood to renovate her house and build a toilet

loans.name: Luis Enrique

texts.es: Enrique de 21 años de edad habita  junto a su compañera de vida y su hijo de 1 año de edad, por lo que se siente feliz de poder proveer de un lugar donde vivir a su familia. Él es un hombre emprendedor que se gana la vida con la elaboración y posteriormente de la venta de pan dulce y francés, actividad que realiza desde hace 3 años y que le ha permitido dar una mejor calidad de vida a su familia. Para Enrique la seguridad de su familia es lo más importante, y ha observado que su vivienda no cuenta con la misma, por lo que ha tomado la decisión de instalar una ventana y construir un cuarto de lámina en su vivienda, para dar una mayor comodidad a su familia, y para ello solicita un crédito a FUSAI para invertir en: láminas, una ventana, madera y clavos para instalar una ventana y construir un cuarto de lámina en su vivienda.
texts.en:
Enrique is 21 years old and lives with his partner and their 1-year-old son. He is happy to have been able to provide a home for his family. He is an entrepreneurial man who makes a living by making and selling pastries and French bread. He has been doing this for the past 3 years and it has allowed him to provide a better quality of life for his family. 

His family's security is the most important thing to Enrique and he has observed that his home does not have enough security. He has decided to install a window and build a room out of sheet metal in his home in order to provide more comfort for his family. He has requested a loan from FUSAI to invest in sheet metal, a window, wood, and nails in order to install a window and build a room out of sheet metal in his home.

loans.use: to invest in sheet metal, a window, wood, and nails in order to install a window and build a room of sheet metal in his home.

loans.name: Benedicto

texts.es:
Benedicto es un hombre de 68 años de edad, soltero, sin hijos y su negocio es el comercio de ganado.
Él es independiente, activo, constante, responsable y trabajador. Su negocio lo realiza en la comunidad de ‘Viruyo’ que se encuentra cercana al Lago Titicaca, con pendientes ligeramente inclinadas, suelos con textura arcillosa con poco drenaje, media profundidad y con problemas de encharcamiento. A una altura de 3.810 metros sobre el nivel del mar; las pendientes van de planas o casi planas con ligeras inclinaciones, el clima es frío húmedo por la cercanía al lago.
Benedicto es de tez morena, baja estatura, cabello negro corto, usa bigote, su lengua materna es el aymara que se habla en el lugar y habla español cuando viaja a la ciudad. Su vida la comparte con su madre, la cual cuida porque ya casi no puede ver, viven en una casa de adobe que cuenta con electricidad. Su negocio es el comercio de ganado para la producción lechera y derivados. Él se dedica a la crianza de ganado vacuno, compra forraje y ganado mejorado, lo cuida y engorda para luego venderlo, también vende leche a productores de queso del lugar; ‘todos los días saco a pastear a mis vaquitas, más allá cerca como a un kilómetro tengo alquilado un pastizal, que también tengo que cuidar para que mis ganado se alimente...’ comenta. El clima del lugar le dificulta su trabajo, en época de invierno los pastizales se secan y el frio hace que las vacas no produzcan leche. Su sueño es tener un establo grande donde pueda guardar a su ganado, él desea realizar la compra de ganado mejorado para la reproducción de su establo. Esta es la primera secuencia de préstamos con la institución en ocho años que viene realizando esta labor.
Es por esos motivos que Benedicto solicita un préstamo para la compra de ganado mejorado para reproducir en su establo.
texts.en:
Benedicto is a 68-year-old man who is single and has no children.  His business involves trading cattle.

Benedicto is independent, active, persevering, responsible, and hardworking.  He conducts his business in the community of Viruyo, which is located near Lake Titicaca.  This area has steep inclines of average depth and clay soil that has poor drainage.  This leads to flooding problems.  The lake is at an altitude of 3,810 meters above sea level.  The terrain is flat or near-flat with slight inclinations.  The weather is cold and humid because of the proximity of the lake.   

Benedicto has a dark complexion, short stature, short black hair, and a moustache.  His native language is Aymara, which he speaks in his hometown.  Whenever he travels to the city, Benedicto speaks Spanish.  He lives with his mother and cares for her because she is not able to see.  They live in an adobe house that has electricity.  His business involves trading cattle for producing milk and making dairy products.  Whenever he raises cattle, Benedicto buys fodder so that the animals can develop.  He cares for them and fattens them up before selling them.  He also sells milk to local cheese producers.  “Every day I let my cows out to graze since I have rented approximately one square kilometer of pasture land.  I also feed them myself in order to take care of them,” says Benedicto.  The local climate makes his work difficult.  During the winter, the pastures dry out and the cows are not able to produce milk in the cold weather.  

His dream is to have a large stable where he can house his cattle.  Benedicto wants to buy better breeding cattle to add to his stable.  This is his first loan with Emprender.  He has been in this line of work for eight years.  

It is for these reasons that Benedicto is requesting a loan.  He will buy better breeding cattle for his stable.

loans.use: to buy better breeding cattle to add to his stable.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to invest in sheet metal, wood, nails, cement, and gravel to build a home out of sheet metal and wood on his property.

loans.name: Maria Scarlen

texts.es:
Maria es una mujer de 37 años de edad, casada, tiene un hijo de 8 años y su negocio es la venta de pollo frito.
Ella es buena madre, trabajadora, responsable, activa y constante. Su trabajo lo realiza en la zona ‘panamericana’ un área caracterizada por el comercio popular informal en todas las áreas, de clima templado durante todo el año y a una altura promedio de 2500 metros sobre el nivel del mar.
Maria es de tez morena, baja estatura, cabello color castaño largo, su lengua materna es el quechua y habla español para el comercio. Su vida la realiza junto a su hijo que estudia en la escuela, viven en casa de su madre que está construida de ladrillo y cuenta con agua potable y electricidad. Su negocio es la venta de pollo frito en un puesto de venta en la calle de su casa. Su comida está compuesta por trozos de carne de pollo tierno, a veces enharinados o rebozados, y luego fritos. El empanado añade una corteza exterior crujiente que evita la pérdida de los jugos pero también absorbe la grasa usada al freír. Lo que distingue a su pollo frito de otras frituras de pollo es que habitualmente las corta por las articulaciones, dejando los huesos y la piel intactos. La piel crujiente bien condimentada, sin exceso de grasa, es el rasgo distintivo de su pollo bien frito; ‘mi negocio es humilde, la experiencia del trabajo me ha enseñado a mejorar la producción diaria; por eso tengo clientes constantes y mi negocio prospera…’. Su sueño es tener un frial grande para la venta por mayor, y desea realizar una inversión en su negocio, realizando la compra por mayor de insumos como; aceite, condimentos, papa y pollo entre otros. Esta es la primera secuencia de préstamos con la institución en 10 años que viene realizando esta actividad.
Es por esos motivos que Maria solicita un préstamo para la compra de insumos de cocina por mayor para la venta de pollo frito.
texts.en:
Maria is a 37 year old woman, is married, has an 8 year old son, and has a business where she sells fried chicken. She is a good mother and is hardworking, responsible, active, and consistent. She works in the "panamericana" zone, and area known for informal, popular commerce of all types. It has a moderate climate year-round and is about 2500 meters above sea level.

Maria has brown skin, is short, and has long, brown hair. Her native language is Quechua and she speaks Spanish for business purposes. She lives with her son, who is in school, in her mother's home, which is made of brick and has running water and electricity.

She makes a living by selling fried chicken in a stall in the street near her home. She uses pieces of tender chicken, which is sometimes floured or battered, and fries them. The breading adds a crunchy, exterior crust that keeps the juices in but also absorbs the fat used to fry the chicken. The thing that distinguishes her fried chicken from other fried chicken is that the others often cut the chicken at the joint and leave the bones and skin intact. Crispy, well-seasoned skin, without excess fat, is the distinguishing element of her excellent fried chicken.

She says, "My business is humble. My experience at this job has taught me to improve my production daily; that is why I have constant customers and my business prospers." Her dream is to have a large stall to sell in bulk and she hopes to make an investment in her business by purchasing supplies like oil, spices, potatoes, chicken, etc. in bulk. 

This is her first loan with this institution in the 10 years that she has had her business. Maria is requesting a loan to purchase cooking supplies in bulk in order to sell fried chicken.

loans.use: to purchase kitchen supplies in bulk in order to sell fried chicken.

loans.name: Ritchell

texts.en:
Ritchell is a hardworking woman. She lives in Leyte, Philippines where she runs a small sari-sari or variety store selling goods and food items to the people in her place. Ritchell has been in the business for more than two years now. This is the source of her income.

Ritchell is asking for a loan to buy more groceries to sell like rice, noodles, canned goods, condiments, sugar, coffee and beverages, biscuits and snack foods, soap, and toiletries. This loan will help her increase her stocks and attract more buyers to her store. 

In the future, Ritchell hopes to make her business more sustainable and productive. Moreover, she wants to save money for the future schooling of her child.

loans.use: to buy more groceries to sell like rice, noodles, buy canned goods, condiments, sugar, coffee and beverages, biscuits and snack foods, soap, and toiletries to sell

loans.name: Yolanda

texts.en:
Yolanda has been running her piggery for over eight years to make a living. She used her revenue for the education costs of her children. She had successfully repaid her previous loan used for buying feeds and piglets. 

Currently, she is taking a new loan to buy ten piglets to raise. She wants to expand her business, and dreams of seeing her children successful in the future.

loans.use: to buy ten piglets to raise.

loans.name: Leona

texts.en:
Leona is a 25-year-old mother who has been gifted with two children. She owns and manages a small retail store to help her husband in earning income. Due to hardship in their daily living, Leona aspires to further improve her business in order to earn a higher income. 

Having inadequate capital, Leona wants to take out a PHP 5,000 loan so she can add to her inventory by buying canned goods, snack foods, noodles, laundry soaps, beverages, seasonings, soft drinks and vegetables to sell. She believes that this financial assistance will be a great help to her in improving her business.

loans.use: to buy canned goods, snack foods, noodles, laundry soaps, beverages, seasonings, soft drinks and vegetables to sell

location.town: Brgy. Almaguer North, Bambang, Nueva Vizcaya

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more vegetables, fruits, canned goods, noodles, soap, toiletries, condiments, etc. to sell

loans.name: Juanito

texts.en:
Felix is married with 6 children and lives in Ozamiz City with his family. He grows and harvests corn, work that he has done since he was young. He gets up early and goes to the fields where he has to oversee his crops. 

He took a new loan recently to buy fertilizer and organic pesticides for his farm in order to have a more productive harvest. He plans to buy a vehicle to use for his transportation from farm to market.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and organic pesticides for his farm to have a more productive harvest.

loans.name: Susana

texts.en:
Rosanna is 17 years old and is the 3rd of 6 children in the family. She is studying for a bachelor of science in tourism management and is currently in the 1st year of this 4-year course. When she graduates, Rossana plans to be gainfully employed.

Susana supports the family through her buy-and-sell cooking materials business in the Philippines. Susana is borrowing 4,300 PHP to pay Rosanna's tuition fees for the second semester of the school year 2014-2015.

loans.use: to pay tuition fees.

loans.name: Erlinda

texts.en:
Erlinda is 54 years old and married with seven children. With one child in school, Erlinda works very hard to provide for them.

Erlinda runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a 7,000 PHP (Philippines pesos) loan through NWTF to purchase additional items to sell like shampoo, candies, canned goods, beverages, etc.

Erlinda has been in this business for four years now. 

In the future, Erlinda would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional items to sell like shampoo, candies, canned goods, beverages, etc.

loans.name: Mastora

texts.en:
Mastora is 57 years old and married with three children. She earns a living by farming coconuts in the Philippines which she has been doing for three years. She earns additional income from farming vegetables.

Mastora is borrowing PHP 15,000 through NWTF to buy additional fertilizers and other farm supplies. She is working tirelessly toward the attainment of her dream which is to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy additional fertilizers and other farm supplies

loans.name: Sambo's Group

texts.en:
Sambo’s group live in a rural village in Phnom Penh province in Cambodia. Sambo makes a living cultivating rice and she also does extra work as a tailor to support her family. 

In their village there is no reliable access to safe, clean drinking water. Having a water filter at home will help each of these women to safeguard the health of their families and save money on medical expenses and save time collecting fuel and boiling water.

loans.use: To buy a water filter to provide safe drinking water for their family.

loans.name: Samnang

texts.en:
Samnang is 26 years old and she is a married garment factory worker with a small child. She lives in Kampong Chhnang province of Cambodia. She has worked at the garment factory since 2012. Her husband is 24 years old and he is also a garment factory worker. 

Each of them can earn approximately $6.22 per day. They spend a lot on traveling expenses to the factory, so Samnang has decided to request a loan to buy a motorcycle for commuting to work. This loan will help her and her husband reduce their traveling expenses. 

For her future plans, she wants to have her own business and support her child to a higher education.

loans.use: to buy a motorcycle for commuting to work.

loans.name: San Juradoam Group

texts.es: Grupo San Juradoam está formado por tres socias emprendedoras de éxito, una de ellas es Jeannette de 46 años de edad, casada, y su negocio es venta de lencería de baño, sabanas y ropa desde hace diez años, este crédito lo invertirá en la compra telas variadas, hilos, agujas, cintas de colores, algodón, y dos máquinas de coser etc con el fin de aumentar la demanda. La segunda socia es la señora Verónica de 31 años de edad y su negocio es la comercialización de atol, leche, tamales desde hace diez años; Y la tercera socia es Katy de 36 años de edad y su negocio es la venta de ropa usada desde año y medio.
texts.en:
The San Juradoam Group is made up of three successful, entrepreneurial members. One of these members is Jeannette, who is 46 years old, is married, and has a business where she sells bath mats, sheets, and clothing. She has had this business for the past 10 years. 

She will invest the loan in the purchase of various fabrics, thread, needles, color belts, cotton, two sewing machines, etc. with the goal of increasing her demand.
