An education is, and will be my main priority. I believe that a good education will help me to achieve my goals and dreams quicker, and Kiva lenders can be catalysts in this case.

My brother studies at AUCA, his tuition is fully covered by donors. He loves AUCA and talks about it all the time. He was the person, who persuaded me to enter AUCA, because AUCA provides its students with a solid academic foundation. Its excellent reputation helps its Alumni to get a job at the best employers in the market. Unwavering adherence to its core values and its vibrant and inspiring culture make AUCA a special place. Now I am a freshman and proud of my brother and myself, who haven't lost our chance to enter this university and hope to be one of those Alumni, that AUCA will be proud of in the future.”

loans.use: to pay for his higher education.

loans.name: Mujeni

texts.en: Mujeni is a forty-five year old Komaza tree farmer. She is married with three children, two of whom are in school. Mujeni supports her family by buying and selling agricultural produce, and growing cassava and maize. She joined Komaza because she sees it as an organization which helps to improve the lives of people. Mujeni plans to buy land for farming and build a house with the profit she earns from her Komaza tree farm.

loans.use: to purchase tree farm planting inputs such as seedlings, and to pay for technical training and planting support.

loans.name: Ana Lidia

texts.es: Ana de 26 años de edad es una mujer admirable que habita al lado de su esposo y sus  hijos un varón de 7 años y una niña de  1 año y 4 meses de edad. Ella es una mujer emprendedora que se esfuerza cada día para poder sostener la economía de su hogar, por medio de la venta de jugos que realiza en su casa de habitación, además su esposo le apoya con los gastos del hogar apoyado en su trabajo. Ana desea construir un  cuarto de lámina para ampliar la vivienda, ya que actualmente el espacio interior es bastante pequeño, y para ello solicita un crédito a FUSAI para invertir en: madera, clavos y lámina galvanizada para construir un cuarto de lámina en su vivienda, y así poder dar una mayor comodidad a su familia.
texts.en: Ana is 26 years old, and is an admirable woman who lives with her husband and her children: a 7-year-old son; and a daughter who is one year and four months old. She is an enterprising woman who makes an effort every day to support her household by selling juices from her home. Her husband helps with the household expenses, and also helps her with her work. Ana would like to build a  room out of sheet metal to expand her house, which is now quite small. For this reason she is requesting a loan through FUSAI to buy wood, nails, and galvanized sheet metal to build a room in her house. This will provide her family with more comfort.

loans.use: to buy wood, nails, and galvanized sheet metal to build a room in her house.

loans.name: Kuña Guapa Group

texts.es:
El grupo llamado Kuña Guapa forma del programa de eliminación de la pobreza, cada una de las integrantes tiene su meta fija en poder ir mejorando en lo que cada una hace por medio de las capacitaciones de la fundación paraguaya.
Una de las integrantes es la Sra. Marta, se encuentra mejorando su situación de pobreza, pero igualmente está consciente de que este trabajo y esfuerzo que está haciendo debe ser continuo y permanente. Entre el trabajo que ella hace cuenta que se dedica a la carpintería y que por medio de este trabajo ayuda a su familia.
Ella pide este préstamo para poder comprar maderas para su negocio, de manera a poder seguir invirtiendo en su emprendimiento.
texts.en:
The group named "Kuña Guapa" is participating in the poverty elimination program. Each member has an established goal of being able to improve through the training that is offered by Fundación Paraguaya.

One of the members is Sra. Marta, who is improving her poverty situation. In addition, she is equally conscious that she must continually work and make a permanent effort. The work she engages in is carpentry, which allows her to help her family.

Marta is requesting a loan in order to buy wood for her business. This enables her to continue investing in her enterprise.

loans.use: to buy wood for her carpentry business.

loans.name: Simon

texts.en:
Simon, aged 20 years old,  is married and is the father of one child who is still small. He has been a businessman running a genge (basic grocery store) selling fruits and vegetables, a business he has been in for two years. Simon starts business early in the morning at 5am, where he goes to market just for new goods to purchase. He says that having new goods everyday at his genge, it's easier to catch up with more people and even easier to resell the closing stocks. His business activities end at midnight and he is able to realize a fair monthly profit.

This is his fourth credit request from Tujijenge Tanzania which he will use to buy fruits and vegetables for his genge. He used the previous credits (all of which paid back successfully) to buy genge items such as fruits and vegetables and cooking oil. Simon received extra income which he used to buy a plot of land and also covered household expenses. In the coming years, he would like to build a nice house for his family.

Simon will be responsible for paying back the loan.

loans.use: to buy fruits and vegetables for his genge (basic grocery store).

loans.name: Bob Angel

texts.en: Bob Angel is very dedicated to his study and wants to become successful in the future. He studies for a Bachelor of Science in Business Administration at a university. His parents were earning income from their own piggery farm. He borrowed this loan from GDMPC to pay for the house rental for his boarding house while studying for this semester. In the future, he wants to find a job that enables him to support himself and his family.

loans.use: to pay for the house rental for his boarding house while studying for this semester.

loans.name: José René

texts.es:
José de 68 años de edad, está casado y tiene 3 hijos, dos tienen hogar propio y su hija menor vive con él y estudia bachillerato. No estudio, sus padres  no se interesaron por su estudio le enseñaron el trabajo del campo. Solo su esposa y su hija menor viven con él y solo ellas dependen de él.

José es agricultor, aprendió de sus padres que le enseñaron desde pequeño, ahora cuenta con más de 30 años de experiencia, necesita el préstamo para cosechar el ajonjolí que sembró que está en el punto de corta, también invertirá el dinero en comprar ganado de repasto para luego comerciarlo. 

Las aspiraciones de José son que termine sus estudios su última hija y lograr sembrar los 28,000 mts  cuadrados de terreno que tiene, nunca a podido por falta de capital para hacerlo.
texts.en: Jose is 68 years old, is married, and has 3 children. Two of them have their own homes, and his youngest daughter lives with him and is a student. He did not go to school, because his parents were not interested in his schooling and taught him to work in the fields. Only his wife and his youngest daughter live with him, and they are dependent on him. Jose is a farmer, and learned to do this at a young age from his parents. He now has more than 30 years of experience. He needs a loan to harvest his sesame, which is ready to be cut. He will also use it to buy cattle to raise and sell. Jose's goals are for his last daughter to finish her studies, and to plant the 28,000 square meters of land that he has. He has never been able to do this, because he did not have enough capital.

loans.use: to harvest his sesame, and to buy cattle to raise and sell.

loans.name: Rene Alonso

texts.es:
René de 26 años de edad, está acompañado y tiene una hija de 3 años de edad, no estudio porque sus padres no le permitieron y lo pusieron mejor a trabajar para que colaborara con los gastos del hogar, su esposa es ama de casa y solo ella y su hija viven con él.

René es agricultor, tiene 10 años de experiencia, aprendió trabajando con sus padres desde pequeño y su única fuente de ingreso hoy en día. Necesita el préstamo para contratar mano de obra y cosechar el ajonjolí que sembró y  que ya está en el punto de corta.

Rene espera aumentar su área de siembra, comenta que le deja muy buenas ganancias y quiere dar el estudio a su hija para que tenga las oportunidades que él no tuvo.
texts.en: Rene is 26 years old. He lives with his spouse, and has a 3-year-old daughter. He did not go to school because his parents did not allow him to go, and made him work to contribute to the household expenses. His wife is a homemaker, and only she and their daughter live with him. Rene is a farmer with 10 years of experience. He learned by working with his parents from a young age, and this is his only source of income now. He needs a loan to hire laborers to harvest the sesame that he planted, which is now ready to be cut. Rene hopes to expand the area that he plants, because it provides good income. He would like to provide an education to his daughter so that she will have the opportunities that he did not have.

loans.use: to hire laborers to harvest the sesame that he planted.

loans.name: Segundo Walter

texts.es:
Segundo Walter tiene 41 años de edad, es conviviente, tiene 2 hijos, vive con su familia en una zona rural del distrito de Oyotún, provincia de Chiclayo, región Lambayeque, costa norte de Perú. Su comunidad está dedicada básicamente a la agricultura, ganadería y al comercio.

Segundo Walter se dedica a la venta de gaseosas; con más de 3 años de experiencia en el negocio, este servicio lo ofrece por todo el distrito de Oyotun, Segundo Walter solicita préstamo para capital de trabajo, pues él desea realizar la compra de cantidades mayores de gaseosa, dicha inversión le servirá para incrementar sus ventas, con gran influencia en el negocio; Segundo Walter piensa tener mayor stock de productos (diferentes marcas de gaseosas y/ o bebeidas) para poder atender las diversas necesidades, requerimientos y gustos de los clientes de la zona. Lo que le permitirá en un corto plazo mejorar sus ingresos, aumentar sus ganancias y por ende mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en: Segundo Walter is 41 years old. He lives with his spouse, and they have 2 children. He lives with his family in a rural area in the district of Oyotun, which is in the province of Chiclayo, in the Lambayeque region on the northern coast of Peru. His community works mainly in agriculture, livestock, and commerce. Segundo Walter works selling soft drinks. He has more than 3 years of experience in this business, and provides his services throughout the district of Oyotun. Segundo Walter is requesting a loan in order to have working capital. He would like to buy larger quantities of soft drinks, which will enable him to increase his sales and have a big impact on his business. Segundo Walter would like to have a greater stock of products (different brands of carbonated drinks and other drinks), in order to meet the needs and tastes of his customers in the area. This will allow him in the short term to increase his income, and thereby to improve the quality of life for himself and his family.

loans.use: to have working capital, because he would like to buy larger quantities of soft drinks.

loans.name: Astra

texts.ru: Астра, 35 лет, не замужем, детей нет. Образование высшее, более 10 лет занимается торговлей обуви. У Астры в магазине широкий ассортимент обуви, в обороте у нее есть товар на сумму 500,000 сом (KGS). Она обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 150,000 сом (KGS) на покупку обуви для увеличения ассортимента товара на зимний сезон. На полученные доходы от кредита Астра планирует и дальше развивать ее бизнес.
texts.en: Astra is 35 years old, not married and does not have children. She has a higher education and has been involved in selling shoes for over 10 years. Astra has a wide selection at her store and a working capital of 500,000 som (KGS) worth of merchandise. She requested a loan in the amount of 150,000 som (KGS) from the "Bai-Tushum" Bank to buy shoes in order to increase her merchandise selection for the winter season. Astra plans to use the earnings from the loan to continue developing her business.

loans.use: to buys shoes in order to increase her merchandise selection for the winter season

loans.name: Uulzhan

texts.ru: Уулжан 51 год, замужем, мать 3 детей, они с радостью помогают по хозяйству. У Уулжан среднее образование, 2 года она занимается животноводством и полеводством. Сейчас в хозяйстве Уулжан есть: 4 коровы и 13 овец, а также земельный надел мерою 0,2 ГА арендованной и 0,7 ГА собственной земли, где она выращивает кукурузу, табак и картофель для реализации. Ежемесячный доход составляет 10,000 сом (KGS) в месяц. Всю полученную от бизнеса прибыль Уулжан старается вкладывать в развитие ее бизнеса, однако она строит дом и необходимо установить пластиковые окна, двери и пол. Поэтому она и обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 50,000 сом (KGS) на покупку окон, дверей и досок. Доходы от сельского хозяйства Уулжан будет направлять на дальнейшее его развитие.
texts.en: Uulzhan is 51 years old, married and a mother of 3 children, who gladly help with the business. Uulzhan has a secondary education and has been involved in animal husbandry and farming for 2 years. Now Uulzhan's farm has 4 cows and 13 sheep, and also 0.2 hectares of leased and 0.7 hectares of owned land, where she grows corn, tobacco and potatoes for sale. Her monthly income amounts to 10,000 som (KGS). Uulzhan tries to invest all of the business profit back into developing the business; however, she is building a house and needs to install plastic windows, doors and floor. This is why she requested a loan in the amount of 50,000 som (KGS) from the "Bai-Tushum" Bank to buy windows, doors and wood. Uulzhan will use the earnings from her agricultural business to further develop it.

loans.use: to purchase plastic windows, doors and wood floor in order to finish the construction of her house

loans.name: Anunciacion

texts.en: Anunciacion has been operating her retail store for over a year and has been able to sustain the business. She supports her needs and provides financially for her children's needs and also paid for some home improvements for a comfortable living. She repaid successfully her previous loan used for the business. She is now aiming to increase sales, and because of this, she took out a new loan to purchase grains and livestock feeding supplies to sell in addition to her current inventory. She hopes to expand her store by making some renovations.

loans.use: to purchase grains and livestock feeding supplies to sell in addition to her current inventory

loans.name: Zarbubu

texts.ru: Зарбубу 56 лет, замужем, мать 5 детей. У нее среднее образование, уже много лет она занимается сельским хозяйством. У Зарбубу есть 2 коровы и 1,75 ГА земельной доли, где Зарбубу выращивает картофель, морковь и ячмень для реализации. Ежемесячный доход составляет около 20,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Зарбубу обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 50,000 сом (KGS), полученные средства она направит на покупку двух коров. Доходы от кредита помогут Зарбубу в будущем развить ее бизнес.
texts.en: Zarbubu is 56 years old, married and a mother of 5 children. She has a secondary education and has been involved in agriculture for many years. Zarbubu has 2 cows and 1.75 hectares of land, where Zarbubu grows potatoes, carrots and barley for sale. The monthly income amounts to about 20,000 som (KGS). In order to further develop her business, Zarbubu requested a loan in the amount of 50,000 som (KGS) from the "Bai-Tushum" Bank to buy two cows. The earnings from the loan will help Zarbubu to grow her business in the future.

loans.use: to buy two cows in order to grow her business

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy wheat and prepare soil for the sowing

loans.name: Edgar

texts.en:
Edgar is a fish vendor from Concepcion, Iloilo, Philippines. He is 44, married and has three children. Edgar also own a small sari-sari or retail store business selling various goods and items to the people in his place. 

Edgar is asking for a loan to buy more stock to sell such as canned goods, noodles, soda and other beverages, bread, biscuits, soap and toiletries and to buy more fish. This loan will help him improve his business as well as his income. In the future, Edgar hopes to make his business productive and sustainable.

loans.use: to buy more stock to sell such as canned goods, noodles, soda, beverages, bread, biscuits, soap and toiletries and to buy more fish

loans.name: Noel

texts.en:
Noel has owned and operated a transport service for over five years to earn a living. He has supported the family's daily needs with this income.    

Recently, he took out a new loan to put up capital for his new meat shop in order to earn more income for the family. He wants to renovate his house for a safer and more comfortable living for his family.

loans.use: to put up capital for his new meat shop

loans.name: Lourdes

texts.en:
Lourdes is 48 years old and a widow with nine children. She works very hard to provide for them.

She buys and sells recycled materials in the Philippines and has requested a 15,000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy empty bottles, used plastics and metals to resell. Lourdes has been in this business for 28 years.

In the future, Lourdes would like to build and expand her business to secure the financial stability of her family.

loans.use: to buy empty bottles, used plastics and metals to resell.

loans.name: Ma. Luz

texts.en:
Ma. Luz works hard to support her family. Ma. Luz is married and has a business buying and selling rice in the Philippines. Ma. Luz has been in this business for eight years now.

She has requested a 19,000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy additional sacks of rice to sell. In the future, Ma. Luz would like to build and expand her business to secure the financial stability of her family.

loans.use: to buy additional sacks of rice to sell

loans.name: Dorothy

texts.en:
Dorothy works hard to support her family. She is a widow and has a buy-and-sell recyclable materials business in the Philippines.

Dorothy requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to buy more recyclable materials to sell. She has been in this business for 30 years now.

In the future, Dorothy would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy more recyclable materials to sell.

loans.name: Loie

texts.en:
Loie is married and manages his own farm for a living. He has been planting and harvesting crops for six years. He has successfully repaid his previous loan used for farm fertilization. 

His farm is doing well and has a better income from this and was able to buy a secondhand motorcycle. Recently, he took a new loan from GDMPC microcredit to buy fertilizer and new tires for his vehicle used in his motorcycle transport business. He wants to have a comfortable house and improved living situation for the entire family in the near future.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and new tires for his vehicle.

loans.name: Makmal

texts.ru: Макмал 55 лет, замужем, мать 5 детей. У Макмал среднее образование, более 20 лет занимается сельским хозяйством. В хозяйстве есть 3 дойные коровы и 2 бычка. Она продает молоко на ежедневной основе, экологически чистое и очень вкусное оно пользуется большим спросом и приносит ежемесячную прибыль в сумме 20,000 сом (KGS). Макмал обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 3,000 долларов (USD) на покупку 2 коров с телятами для увеличения объемов реализации молока. Доходы от кредита Макмал планирует вложить в дальнейшее приумножение количества домашней скотины, что поможет ей накопить средства на ремонт дома.
texts.en: Makmal is 55 years old, married and a mother of 5 children. Makmal has a secondary education and has been involved in agriculture for over 20 years. She has 3 dairy cows and 2 bulls on her farm. On a daily basis she sells ecologically-clean and delicious milk that is in high demand, and the business yields a monthly profit of 20,000 som (KGS). Makmal requested a loan in the amount of 3,000 dollars (USD) from the "Bai-Tushum" Bank to buy two cows with calves in order to increase her milk sales. Makmal plans to invest the earnings from the loan into further increasing her livestock quantities, which will help her save money to repair her house.

loans.use: to buy two cows with calves in order to increase her sales of eco-friendly milk

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy rollers for kneading bread

loans.name: Livingstone's Group

texts.en:
Livingstone is a 51-year-old proud father of five children. He is a group leader, often described as a very reliable person, and is representing his group of 13 farmers in Teso District. Since joining One Acre Fund in 2012, Livingstone has noticed that he has been able to consistently feed his family.

Livingstone described his harvest as good last year, but believes he can have a better one this year by continuing to work with One Acre Fund. He is very excited to also be purchasing a solar light, apart from fertilizer and maize, because he will now be able to reduce the consumption of paraffin fuel and therefore save more money. With the profits from this season’s harvest, he plans to send his children to school.

With this loan, Livingstone’s Group will be able to plant a total of 6.25 acres of land and purchase a total of 12 solar lights.

loans.use: to purchase a solar light and gain access to cost efficient hybrid seeds and fertilizer for maize cultivation.

loans.name: Anastacia

texts.en:
Anastacia is a 53-year-old married woman with six children, three of whom are still in school. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. 

Anastacia has a buy and sell gasoline business in the Philippines and has requested a 15,000 Philippines pesos (PHP) loan through NWTF to buy additional stocks of gasoline.

Anastacia has been in this business for three years. In the future, she would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy more gasoline to sell

loans.name: Herradura Group

texts.es:
LUZ MARIA mujer emprendedora de 31 años de edad. vive con su esposo en su propia y pequeña casa. tienen 5 hijos. 4 de ellos estudian y su ultima niña posee discapacidad.
es muy difícil aceptar que el gobierno no le ayude como lo hace con otras personas que también cuentan con discapacidad.
LUZ MARIA desde su primer crédito ha trabajado en la cría de pollos . con este nuevo crédito de $750,00 ella espera comprarse 200 pollos -vitaminas y alimentos para pollos.
ella comercializa estos pollos en su propia comunidad. entregando a tiendas y vendiendo a personas que le buscan en su casa.
tiene deseos de construir un galpón grande criar muchos pollos y dar trabajo a las personas que lo requieran. ya que en la comunidad no hay fuentes de empleo.
esta muy agradecida por la oportunidad que se la brinda para trabajar en beneficio de su comunidad.

LUZ MARIA es de familia muy humilde y tiene deseos de poder ayudar a la gente joven de su comunidad.

INFORMACION ADICIONAL.
la persona que levanta la mano en la imagen es el líder del grupo. todos pertenecen a la misma comunidad y están bien organizados en el trabajo por el desarrollo de la comunidad que habitan
texts.en:
Luz Maria, an enterprising 31 year o d woman, lives with her husband in their own small house.   They have five children; four are in school and the youngest, a girl, is handicapped.  It's hard for them to accept the fact that the government won't help her, as is done for other handicapped people.

Since getting her first loan, Luz Maria has worked at raising chickens.  With this new loan of $750,00, she hopes to buy 200 chickens, vitamins and feed for them.  She sells these chickens in her own community, taking them to stores and selling to people who seek her out at home. Luz Maria wants to build a really large chicken coop to care for many chickens and provide work to people who need it, since there are few sources of employment in the area. She is grateful for the opportumity provided for her to work for the benefit of her community. Luz Maria is from a very poor family and wants to help the young people in her community.

ADDITIONAL INFORMATION:  The person raising a hand in the photo is the group leader.  All members belong to the same community and are well organized in their work for development of the community where they live.

loans.use: to buy 200 chickens, food and watering troughs, vitamins and balanced chicken feed

loans.name: Merly

texts.en:
Merly is 34 years old, married and is a very hard working entrepreneur who has a fishing business in the Philippines. Merly has requested a 13,000 Philippines pesos (PHP) loan through NWTF to buy plywood, fish net materials and paint.

Merly has been in this business for five years. In the future, she would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy plywood, fish net materials and paint.

loans.name: Paul W's Group

texts.en:
Paul W's Group is made up of ten farmers in the Teso District of Kenya, being represented by group leader Paul (pictured above). He is 31 years old, married and has three children. He has been a farmer for eight years and is often referred to as a very hard working individual.

Paul is not new to One Acre Fund; he joined the program in 2014 and has since noticed his life has changed, especially in the sense that he has been able to consistently feed his family ever since. This year, Paul will not only receive fertilizer and maize seeds as part of his loan, but will also buy a solar light. He is very excited about this addition since now he will be able to have light during dark hours for his children to study.

Using this loan, Paul W's Group will purchase a total of nine solar lights and use the farming inputs received to plant a total of 4.25 acres.

loans.use: to buy a solar light, as well as hybrid seeds and fertilizer to improve harvests of maize.

loans.name: Kholbuvy

texts.en: Kholbuvy comes from a rural area and is a hard working and smart 21-year-old woman. She lives with her parents, who are busy raising animals. She helps her parents to feed the animals and she also studies at the Khujand State University. Kholbuvy is a third year student who studies well and she reads many books. In the future she hopes to become a good specialist and work for the well-being of her country. Kholbuvy is asking for a loan of $700 USD to pay for her university tuition. She awaits your generosity.

loans.use: to pay for her university tuition

loans.name: Delma

texts.en:
As a married parent of four children, Delma works hard to support her family.

She has a seaweed business in the Philippines and also earns additional income from fish vending. Delma is borrowing 10,000 Philippines pesos (PHP) through NWTF to buy materials to use in her seaweed business.

Delma has been sustaining her business activities through her past 11 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream of saving enough money to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy materials for her seaweed business

loans.name: Dulce

texts.en:
Dulce is a married woman with six children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. She is 39 years old and has three children who are currently in school.

Dulce has an abaca weaving business in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 11,000 loan amount through NWTF to purchase more raw materials for her weaving business.

Dulce has been in this business for three years. In the future, she would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase more raw materials for her weaving business

loans.name: Ainura

texts.ru: Айнура, 25 лет, не замужем, детей нет. У Айнуры среднее образование, она занимается сельским хозяйством. У нее  есть 3 коровы, летом занимается полеводством. Для дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Айнура обратилась в Банк «Бай – Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 50,000 сом (KGS) на покупку скота племенных пород с целью разведения и увеличения поголовья скота. Доходы от кредита Айнура будет использовать для развития своего хозяйства, а также она хочет накопить средства на постройку сарая для скота.
texts.en: Ainura is 25 years old, not married and does not have children. Ainura has a secondary education and is involved in agriculture. She has 3 cows and is involved in farming in the summer. In order to further develop her business, Ainura requested a loan in the amount of 50.000 som (KGS) from the "Bai-Tushum" Bank to buy purebred livestock to breed and increase her livestock headcount. Ainura will use the earnings from the loan to develop her business and also wants to save money for building a barn for livestock.

loans.use: to purchase additional purebred livestock in order to invest in her business

loans.name: Loice's Group

texts.en:
Loice is a proud 37-year-old mother of 5 children. She is the group leader, often described as a very hardworking individual, and is representing her group of 13 farmers from the Matete District. Since joining One Acre Fund in 2012, Loice has noticed that she has had more profits from each harvest.
Loice described her harvest as good last year, but believes she can have a better one this year by continuing to work with One Acre Fund. She is very excited to also be purchasing two solar lights, apart from fertilizer and maize, because she will now be able to have light during the dark hours for her children to be able to study. With the profits from this season’s harvest, she plans to send her children to school.
With this loan, Loice’s Group will be able to plant a total of 6.5 acres of land and purchase a total of 10 solar lights.

loans.use: to purchase hybrid seeds and fertilizer for the cultivation of maize, as well as two solar lights.

loans.name: Mernita

texts.en:
As a married woman of one child, Mernita works hard to support her family.
She buys and sells weaving bamboo in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from raising livestock. Mernita is borrowing PHP 25,000 through NWTF to purchase additional bamboo.
Mernita has been sustaining her business activities through her past 22 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional bamboo for her business.

loans.name: Chirlita

texts.en:
Thirty-six year old Chirlita provides cosmetology services. She provides services such as manicures and pedicures. She is married and has five children. Her oldest is 16 and the youngest is 2 years old.
She has been engaged in this business for almost 7 years. Aside from that, she works in the food vending business. She makes and sells banana cue (deep fried bananas coated in caramelized brown sugar), and sweet potato cakes. Chirlita has requested a loan of 7,000 PHP to purchase materials to use for manicures and pedicures like nail polish, cuticle pushers, polish remover and the remainder to use as additional capital for her food vending business. This will be very helpful in improving her services and produce more snack food to sell.
Chirlita hopes that she can be more productive in handling both businesses to support the education of her children.

loans.use: to purchase materials to use for manicures and pedicures like nail polish, cuticle pushers, polish remover and the remainder to use as additional capital for her food vending business.

loans.name: Evangeline

texts.en:
Evangeline is 38 years old and married with two children.
Evangeline is in the agricultural business, raising pigs in the Philippines. Evangeline requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to buy feeds, vitamins, vaccines and other supplies for her pigs.
Evangeline has been raising pigs for 1 year now, and has borrowed 3 times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.
Evangeline would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy feeds, vitamins, vaccines and other supplies for her pigs.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase food products for resale in order to be more competitive

loans.name: Norma Araceli

texts.es: Norma, tiene 29 años de edad, es madre soltera, tiene dos hijos a su cargo, vive en una aldea del municipio de Gracias, Lempira. Ella siempre se ha dedicado a la agricultura con su familia. Hace 10 años que cultiva sus propias parcelas de maíz y frijoles, el cual vende en el mercado de la zona. Esta actividad es su fuente de ingresos para mantener a su familia. Con el fin de mejorar el cultivo de maíz y obtener una mejor cosecha ha solicitado un préstamo de 5,000 Lempiras para comprar insumos, abono y aplicarle al cultivo de maíz y frijol de la nueva siembra. Su plan es seguir ampliando los cultivos y mejorar los ingresos de su hogar.
texts.en: Norma is 29 years old. She is a single mother and has two children. She lives in a small town in the municipality of Gracias, Lempira. She has always worked in agriculture with her family. For 10 years she has been farming her own plots for corn and beans, she then sells them at the local market. This work is her source of income for looking after her family. In order to improve her corn crops and get a better harvest she is asking for a loan of 5,000 Lempiras to buy fertilizer supplies and to use them to grow corn and beans in the next planting season. Her plan is to continue to expand her crops and to improve her household income.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer supplies and to grow corn and beans.

loans.name: Moses's Group

texts.en:
Moses, pictured above, has been a farmer for 15 years, and is now proud to represent his group of 15 farmers from the Teso District. He is 34 years old, is married and has 5 children.
Moses likes to think of himself as a very hardworking individual. He has been working alongside One Acre Fund since 2012 and decided to represent his group because he wanted to help more farmers. He says that being part of the One Acre Fund community has meant that he has learned a lot from farming training. Moses plans to use the profits from this coming season to send his children to school.
In total, Moses’s Group will receive inputs to cultivate 6.25 acres of land. Given that some members of the group will also be purchasing a solar light, with this loan, the group will also receive a total of 12 solar lights.

loans.use: to purchase hybrid seeds and fertilizer to improve harvests of maize.

loans.name: Francisco Javier

texts.es:
Una gran variedad de corte de cabellos son los que ofrece Francisco Javier en su  pequeña barbería. Desde hace ocho años que  empezó su propio negocio con pocas herramientas de trabajo. Hoy en día a raíz de la firmeza y dedicación en su trabajo ha logrado obtener mayores ingresos, pero para el no es suficiente debido que ahora está a cargo de una hija adolescente y su esposa. Solicita el préstamo para la compra de sillas para la barbería y así ofrecer más comodidad a sus clientes al momento de atenderlos.
El mayor anhelo de Francisco es  poder asegurar un futuro próspero a su familia, por eso entre sus planes esta establecer 3 barberías más que presten las condiciones a todo tipo de público  y  así obtener  un nuevo activo fijo que pueda  generar  mayores ingresos  para invertir en el negoció y para compartir con su familia.
texts.en:
Francisco Javier offers a great variety of men's haircuts at his small barber shop. It has been eight years since he started his own business with only the most basic of work tools. Due to his will power and work dedication he has managed to increase his income, but this does not yet satisfy him as he is now responsible for an adolescent daughter and his wife.
He is asking for a loan to buy chairs for his barber shop so as to offer more comfort to his customers while attending them.
Francisco's biggest dream is to be able to offer his family a secure and prosperous future. Therefore, he has among other plans the idea of opening three barber shops, providing he is granted the money, which would secure him with more income that he could invest in his business and share with his family.

loans.use: to buy chairs for the barber shop.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to furnish an exhibition room for the clothes she makes.

loans.name: Lamauratou

texts.fr: Lamouratou vit avec son conjoint et leurs 05 enfants à Lomé. Pour contribuer aux besoins de la famille, elle revend des produits d'alimentation générale, des sacs et des céréales à domicile. En 2008, elle a démarré cette activité et s'approvisionne au Grand Marché de Lomé. Son troisième prêt l'aidera à acheter des marchandises afin de répondre aux besoins des clients. son souhait est d'agrandir son activité et contribuer à l'épanouissement de la famille.
texts.en: Lamouratou lives with her spouse and their 5 children in Lomé. In order to be able to contribute to her family's needs, she sells groceries, bags and cereals from her home. She started her business in 2008 and gets her supplies at the Grand Market in Lomé. Her third loan will enable her to buy some merchandise so that she can respond to her customers' needs. She would like to expand her business and to contribute to her family's development.

loans.use: to buy grocery products.

loans.name: Ablavi

texts.fr: Mariée et mère d’un enfant, ABLAVI a 36 ans et demeure dans une chambre louée dans le quartier Cassablanca. ABLAVI est très active, depuis 2010, elle vend du maïs devant son domicile. Par manque de fonds de roulement suffisant, elle ravitaille son stock deux fois par mois. Afin de réduire les frais de transport et augmenter son stock, ABLAVI sollicite un prêt pour augmenter les bénéfices lui permettront d’augmenter son chiffre d’affaire et de contribuer aux dépenses de la famille.
texts.en: Married and the mother of one child, Ablavi is 36 years old and lives in a rented room in the district of Cassablanca. Ablavi is very active and has been selling maize in front of her home since 2010. Due to a lack of sufficient capital, she has to restock twice a month. In order to reduce her transport costs and increase her inventory, Ablavi is requesting a loan so that she can increase her profits which will allow her to increase her turnover and contribute to the family expenses.

loans.use: to buy a bag of maize.

loans.name: Catalina

texts.en: Catalina is a widow with two children who opened her grocery store to make more income for her family. She also had a farm in her village, for which she used and successfully repaid her previous loan. She has taken out a new loan from GDMPC micro credit so she can buy additional goods for her store. Catalina hopes to expand her business and build a bigger store in the future.

loans.use: to buy more groceries for her store

loans.name: Lola

texts.es:
Lola es una mujer de 39 años de edad, vive con su pareja, tiene un hijo varón de 8 años y una hija mujer de 4 años, y su negocio es el comercio de máquinas de gimnasia.
Ella es buena madre, independiente, constante, responsable y trabajadora. Su trabajo lo realiza en la zona Sur de la ciudad, un área caracterizada por el comercio de buen gusto. De clima seco y templado, con una temperatura promedio de 21 grados centígrados durante todo el año.
Lola es de tez morena, baja estatura, cabello negro largo, su lengua materna es el aymara y habla español por el comercio. su vida la realiza con su pareja que trabaja como constructor asalariado y sus hijos; el mayor estudia en la escuela y el menor se encuentra al cuidado de la madre, toda la familia vive en una casa propia construida de ladrillo que cuenta con agua potable y electricidad. Su negocio es el comercio de máquinas de gimnasia en casa, como; bicicletas estacionarias, cinta para correr, máquina escaladora, colchonetas, Mancuernas pequeñas, banda o goma elástica, pelota gigante (llamada “fit ball”), etc. Comercio que realiza en la feria ’16 de julio’ los jueves y domingos, ‘inicié mi negocio hace 6 años con un capital de trabajo mínimo, luego trabajé con un capital prestado de mis padres que me impulsó a continuar…’. Su sueño es tener un auto propio para poder transportar las máquinas que comercia y desea realizar la ampliación de su negocio mediante la compra de variedad de máquinas de gimnasia para surtir su negocio. Esta es la segunda secuencia de préstamos con la institución en 6 años que viene realizando esta actividad. 
Es por esos motivos que Lola solicita un préstamo para la compra de máquinas de gimnasia para surtir su oferta para sus clientes.
texts.en:
Lola is 39 years old. She lives with her partner, a son of 8 years and a daughter of 4 years. Her business is selling gym equipment.
She is a good mother, independent, reliable, responsible and hard working. She goes about her business in the southern area of the city, which is known for trade that is in good taste. The area has a dry and mild climate with an average temperature of 21 degrees during the whole year.
Lola has a darker complexion, is of low hight and has long black hair. Her mother tongue is Aymara and she speaks Spanish for business.
She goes about life with her partner, who works as a construction worker, and her children, of which the older one is at school and the younger one at home. The whole family lives in their own brick house, which has drinking water and electricity.
Lola's business is selling gym equipment for the home, such as stationary bicycles, treadmills, stair machines, mats, small dumbbells, elastic bands and huge balls (called "fit balls"), etc. She sells at the "16th of July" market on thursdays and sundays.
"I started my business 6 years ago with minimal working capital, later I worked with a loan from my parents that encouraged me to continue the business…". She dreams of having an own car so as to transport the equipment she sells and hopes to realize the enlarging of her business by buying a greater variety of equipment so as to stock up her business.
This is the second sequence of loans with this institution in the past 6 years that Lola has been going about her business. For this reason Lola is asking for a loan to buy the gym equipment so as to stock up her offer to the customers.

loans.use: to buy more gym equipment so as to better her offer to the customers.

loans.name: Amé

texts.fr: Agée de  36 ans, AME Vit dans le quartier Dogbéavou avec sa famille ; elle est  veuve avec trois enfants. Elle vend des produits de beauté depuis 2006 et s’approvisionne deux foix par mois au grand marché de Lomé.AME vend à domicile et parfois circule dans son quartier et les environnants pour augmenter ses ventes. AME est très dynamique et souhaite agrandir  son activité par ce microcrédit en achetant 50 unités de mèches et 11 sachets de perles.
texts.en: 36-year-old Ame lives in the district of Dogbéavou with her family. She is a widow and has 3 children. She has been selling beauty products since 2006 and gets her supplies twice a month at the Grand Market in Lomé. Ame makes her sales door-to-door and occasionally goes around her district and the surrounding area to increase her sales. Ame is a very dynamic woman and wishes to expand her business by using this microloan to buy 50 lots of hair extensions and 11 small bags of pearls.

loans.use: to buy 50 lots of hair extensions and 11 small bags of plastic pearls.

loans.name: Livingstone's Group

texts.en:
Livingstone, pictured above, is representing his farming group of eight farmers from Teso District, Kenya. He is 36 years old and a married father of six children, often described as a very trustworthy person. 

Although Livingstone has been a farmer for 18 years, he is new to One Acre Fund and decided to join this year because he really wanted to earn enough to feed his family. Even though he is new to the program, Livingstone wanted to represent his group because he wanted to help more farmers. With the profits earned from this season’s harvest, Livingstone hopes to be able to send his children to school.

With this loan, the group will receive farming inputs to plant a total of 2.5 acres of land. They will also receive a total of four solar lights, as some of the farmers in the group (though not Livingstone) will be buying a solar light as part of their loan package.

loans.use: to buy hybrid seeds and fertilizer for the cultivation of maize

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay his university fees.

loans.name: Juan Gabriel

texts.es:
Juan Gabriel tiene 27 años, nació en la provincia Ñuflo de Chávez, del departamento de Santa Cruz – Bolivia, trabaja en el área de soporte de Sistemas Informáticos y vive con su familia. Él nos comenta que además de trabajar durante el día, por las noches se encuentra estudiando la carrera de Ingeniería de Sistemas y los ingresos que percibe los utiliza para cubrir los gastos del hogar por lo que solicita un crédito educativo para poder culminar sus estudios. Juan Gabriel manifiesta que su mayor motivación para salir adelante es su familia y el poder darles una mejor calidad de vida.

Uno de los sueños de Juan Gabriel, es el de poder contar con su propia empresa de solución de problemas en software, donde a su vez pueda ayudar a otros jóvenes como él a superarse. 

Juan Gabriel se siente muy agradecido y motivado con el Programa, así como también con aquellas personas que confiaron en él y le están dando una oportunidad de alcanzar sus sueños.
texts.en:
Juan Gabriel is 27 years old and was born in the province of Ñuflo de Chávez, part of the departament of Santa Cruz, Bolivia. He works in the area information systems and lives with his family. He works during the day and at night is obtaining his degree in systems engineering. His income is used for covering the home expenses so he's requesting an education loan to be able to finish his studies. 
Juan Gabriel's main motivation for keeping with his studies and moving forward is his family and being able to improve their quality of life. One of his dreams is to have his own software solutions business where at the same time he can help other youths to learn and move forward in life. He is very motivated and grateful to the Program and with the people that have trusted him and are giving him the opportunity to make his dreams come true.

loans.use: pay for his degree in systems engineering.

loans.name: Lilliam Isabel

texts.es:
Lo más importante para una persona es superarse y tener las ganas de ser alguien y sin duda este ha sido el caso de Lilliam Isabel, quien a sus 21 años cursa su último año de la carrera de Administración de empresas en la Universidad. La joven se distingue por ser  una estudiante de constante excelencia académica, emprendedora y esforzada. Desea poder ejercer su carrera por lo tanto solicita el crédito para sufragar gastos de la realización de monografías, lo que comprende de impresiones y empastado de la tesis.
Lilliam asegura que después de obtener su título podrá demostrar sus capacidades al mundo laboral y obtener un buen trabajo.  Una de sus mayores ambiciones es convertirse en la administradora y propietaria de un restaurante, ya que además de ser amante de los idiomas también admira la cocina. La joven espera alcanzar sus metas y ser un orgullo para sus padres y su comunidad.
texts.en:
The most important thing for a person is to have the desire to grow, overcome challenges and become somebody. This is without a doubt the case of Lilliam Isabel who at 21 years of age is in the last year of her degree of business administration at the university. She's known for her constant academic excellence, initiative, and effort.  
She'd like to finish her degree so she's requesting a loan to pay for the expenses of completing her dissertation, including the printing and binding of her thesis. Lilliam is certain that after obtaining her degree she'll be able to show her skills in the workforce and find a good job. 
One of her goals is to be the owner and administrator of a restaurant since she loves the kitchen as well as languages. She hopes to achieve her goals and be a source of pride for her parents and the community.

loans.use: pay for the expenses of completing her dissertation, including the printing and binding of her thesis.

loans.name: Safrokhon

texts.en: Safrokhon was born in 1961 and is married with four children. She is a nurse who has worked for some years in a sanatorium. Safrokhon’s elder son is a migrant in Russia while her younger son studies at the National University of Tajikistan. He is doing well and is studying Credit and Finance. Safrokhon must pay for her son's tuition and with this aim she is asking for a loan of $1700 USD. She awaits your generosity.

loans.use: to pay for her son's tuition fees

loans.name: Martha Guadalupe

texts.es:
Martha es una señora trabajadora, que día con día no deja de emprender para salir adelante con su familia. Hace un año ella recibió un préstamo con el cual pudo comprar sillas y mesas para acondicionar su establecimiento de comida y pulpería. Razón por la que esta mujer de 51 años, agradece de corazón a quienes la apoyaron económicamente, pues con ese crédito el número de clientes fueron aumentando y por ende sus ingresos crecieron.
Martha ha trabajado fuerte llevando a sus dos hijos adelante desde que quedó viuda, por lo que se ha convertido es una mujer ejemplo para la sociedad. Ahora, a pesar que considera tener un negocio estable, su visión de seguir creciendo sigue en pie. Por esta razón, solicita un nuevo crédito para comprar arroz, frijoles, maíz, gaseosa, sopas instantáneas, verduras, entre otros productos para su comidería y su pulpería. Esto le permitirá tener variedad y tener más ingresos que le permitirán ahorrar para cumplir con el sueño de ampliar el negocio.
texts.en:
Martha is a hard working woman, who day after day does not stop making an effort to move ahead with her family. A year ago she received a loan with which she was able to buy chairs and tables to better the conditions of her food establishment and corner store. Here for the 51 year old woman thanks with all her heart the people who supported her economically as the number of customers and consequentially her income increased with this loan.
Martha has worked hard to get ahead her two children since she became a widow and has become a exemplary woman for society.
Now, although she believes to have a stable business, she still works towards her dream to continue growing. Therefore, she is asking for a loan to buy rice, beans, corn, soft drinks, instant soups, vegetables and other products for her eatery and corner store. This would allow her to offer a greater variety and thus increase her income and allow her to save towards her dream of expanding the business.

loans.use: to buy rice, beans, corn, soft drinks, instant soups, and vegetables among other products.

loans.name: Dédé

texts.fr: Dédé a pour mari un cuisinier. Elle a ouvert un bar dans lequel elle vend des boissons depuis 2010.  Son second prêt lui servira d'acheter des marchandises. Le gain tiré lui permettra d'améliorer son stock et de subvenir aux besoins de la famille.
texts.en: Dédé has a husband who is a chef. She opened a bar in 2010 and sells drinks there. Her second loan wil be used to buy supplies. The profit she makes will enable her to build up her stock and provide for her family's needs.

loans.use: to buy drinks.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy inputs for market gardening.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy inputs for market gardening.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy inputs for market gardening.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy inputs for market gardening.

loans.name: Guliniso

texts.ru: Гулинисо 34 летняя жительница не большого района под названием Кубадиён. Она замужем и имеет троих детей. Гулинисо добрая и отзывчивая женщина. Она помогает родителям заниматься продажей овощей. Когда ее родители заняты она подменяет их. Гулинисо живет в трудных условиях и часто сталкивается с тяжелыми финансовыми трудностями.Также дома она занимается животноводством. Гулинисо хочет купить пару голов скотин  увеличить поголовья скотов. Ей не хватает средств, чтобы сделать эту покупку. Таким образом, Гулинисо нуждается в кредите.
texts.en:
Guliniso is a 34 year old resident of a small region called Qubadiyon. She is married and has three children. Guliniso is a good and responsible woman. She helps her parents with selling vegetables. When her parents are busy, she steps in for them. 

Guliniso lives under difficult conditions and often faces serious financial difficulties. She also works with livestock breeding at her house. Guliniso would like to purhcase two heads of livestock to increase their number. She does not have enough money to make this purchase. Therefore she needs a loan.

loans.use: to purchase two heads of livestock and develop her livestock breeding business

loans.name: Alona

texts.en:
Alona is a married woman and a mother of two young children from Leyte, Philippines. She runs a small sari-sari or variety store selling goods like noodles, soda, rice, bread, biscuits, toiletries as well as other items.
Alona has been in the business for more than two years now.
Alona is asking for a loan to buy more of the previously mentioned stocks to sell. This will help her improve her inventory thus attracting more buyers to her store.
Alona hopes of making her business successful in the future. She also wants to save money for future schooling of her children.

loans.use: to buy more stocks of noodles, canned goods, soda, beverages, soap and toiletries to sell.

loans.name: Cecelia

texts.en: Cecelia is married, and she has five grown children that have helped her and her husband in operating their corn production farm for many years. She has successfully repaid her previous loan used for fertilizer. Recently, she took out a new loan to purchase planting materials like organic fertilizer and new varieties of seeds. It is their main source of income, so she wants to ensure a higher level of income for their future needs. She hopes for a bountiful harvest and an expanded cultivation area.

loans.use: to purchase planting materials like organic fertilizer and new varieties of seeds.

loans.name: Gladys María

texts.es:
La  Señora Gladys  tiene 52 años de edad, es madre de 5 hijos, reside en compañía de dos de sus hijos y dos nietos en el municipio de San Francisco de Yojoa, Departamento de Cortés.
Doña Gladys  se dedicaba a empleo privado pero hace 4 años fue cesanteada de su empleo y decidió dedicarse a la venta de productos de belleza por catalogo.
Ella vende cremas, lociones, acondicionadores para cabello y productos de belleza para damas y caballeros. La venta la realiza de manera ambulante y por encargo.
Con el propósito de ampliar la oferta de productos, Doña Gladys ha solicitado otro préstamo por la cantidad de 15,000 Lempiras, con el cual va comprar cremas, champú, lociones, desodorantes y productos para el cabello.
Considera que con el apoyo financiero obtenido logrará crecer en su negocio para lograr una mejoría en su calidad de vida familiar.
texts.en:
Gladys is 52 years old and a mother to five children. She lives with two of her children and two of her grandchildren in the municipality of San Francisco de Yojoa in Cortés department.

Gladys used to have a job with a private organisation but was dismissed from this work four years ago. She then decided to start a business selling beauty products from a catalogue.

Gladys sells creams, hair conditioner and other beauty products for men and women. She is a street vendor and also receives orders.

With the aim of offering more products, Gladys is applying for another loan of 15,000 Lempira in order to buy creams, shampoo, conditioner, deodorants, and other hair products.

Gladys believes that, with this financial support, she will be able to expand her business in order to improve her family's quality of life.

loans.use: to buy creams, shampoo, conditioner, deodorants, and other hair products.

loans.name: Nelia

texts.en:
Nelia works hard to support her family. Nelia is married buys and sells mud crabs in the Philippines.
She requested a PHP 11,000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional mud crabs to sell.
Nelia has been in this business for 10 years now.
In the future, Nelia would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase additional mud crabs to sell.

loans.name: Alymbubu

texts.ru: Алымбубу, 64 года, вдова, есть сын. У Алымбубу среднее образование, имеет очень хорошие отзывы от своих соседей. Они отзываются о ней как о доброй и трудолюбивой женщине. Алымбубу в качестве основного дохода для своей семьи уже 45 лет занимается животноводством и полеводством. В хозяйстве есть 2 дойные коровы, 20 овец. Дополнительно у Алымбубу есть земельный надел мерою 2,0 ГА собственной и 1,0 ГА арендованной земли, где она выращивает пшеницу, ячмень, картофель, люцерну, реализуя продукцию местным жителям и оптовым покупателям. Благодаря упорному труду Алымбубу, ее деятельность приносит около 10,000 сом (KGS) в месяц, что служит основой для покрытия расходов на питание и бытовые нужды семьи. Этих средств не хватает на достойную жизнь, поэтому Алымбубу решила развить свою деятельность и обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 120,000 сом (KGS) на покупку племенного скота. Доходы от кредита позволят Алымбубу улучшить ее благосостояние и дальше развивать бизнес.
texts.en:
Alymbubu is 64 years old and a widow. She has a son. Alymbubu has secondary education. She gets very good credentials from her neighbors. They describe her as a good and hardworking woman. 

As a main source of income for her family, Alymbubu has worked with field crop cultivation and livestock breeding for a 45 years. She has two dairy cows and 20 sheep on her farm. In addition, she owns a plot of land of 2.0 hectares and rents 1.0 hectares of land, where she grows wheat, barley, potatoes and alfalfa. She sells these products to local residents and wholesale buyers. 

Thanks to Alymbubu's persistent work, her business brings in around 10,000 som (KGS) per month, which is the basis for covering the family's food expenses and household needs. This is not enough for a dignified life, and therefore Alymbubu decided to expand her business and turned to the bank "Bai Tushum" for a loan in the amount of 120,000 som (KGS) to purhcase purebred livestock. The income from the loan will allow Alymbubu to increase her welfare and further develop her business.

loans.use: to purchase additional purebred livestock in order to increase her income

loans.name: Mamura

texts.ru:
Мамура живет в городе Истаравшан. Ей 28 лет. На этом фото она запечатлена рядом с тануром во время выпечки лепешки для своей семьи. 
Мамура замужем и имеет ребенка. Она у себя дома занимается шитьем и зарабатывает этим на жизнь. Швейную деятельность она начала 6 лет назад. Ее муж мастер-строгальщик. Он работает с лесоматериалами. 
В данный момент Мамура и ее муж нуждаются в заемных средствах. Они давно уже хотят провести церемонию обрезания своего сына, однако для его расходов они все не могут накопить достаточной суммы денег. Мамура решила обратиться за кредитом. Она верит, что в мире много отзывчивых людей и что их семью обязательно поддержат в эту нужную минуту.
texts.en:
Mamura lives in the city of Istaravshan. She is 28 years old. In this photo she is captured next to the tanur (baking oven) while baking flatbred for her family. 

Mamura is married and has a child. She works with sewing at her house, and earns money for living this way. She started the sewing business six years ago. Her husband is a master planner. He works with timber. 

Currently Mamura and her husband need to borrow money. They have long wanted to have a ceremony for their son's circumcision. However, they are not able to save enough money for this expense. Mamura decided to apply for a loan. She believes that there are many helpful people in the world, and that they certainly will help her family in this time of need.

loans.use: to hold a ceremony for her son's circumcision

loans.name: Nida

texts.en:
Nida is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a fishing business in the Philippines.
She is borrowing PHP 30,000 through NWTF to buy more fishing nets.
Nida has been in this business for 5 years. Nida earns additional income from pig fattening.
Nida has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts and with the help of the loans from NWTF. She dreams to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college in the future.

loans.use: to buy more fishing nets.

loans.name: Phylis' Group

texts.en:
Phylis is 27 years old and is often described as a very friendly person. She has 2 children and is married. As a group leader, Phylis is representing her group of 11 farmers from the Matete District in Kenya, and is very excited to be working with One Acre Fund for the first time this year.
The decision to join One Acre Fund was largely a result of Phylis's desire to have access to quality training and acquire new farming methods. Apart from receiving farming inputs, she is also purchasing a solar light as part of her loan, which is very exciting to her as she will now be able to have light during the dark hours for her children to be able to study. With the profits that she gains from this year’s harvest, she plans to invest in a business.
Phylis and her group will receive a total of 10 solar lights as well as input loans of maize and fertilizer to plant a total of 5.25 acres.

loans.use: to purchase a solar light and gain access to cost efficient hybrid seeds and fertilizer for maize cultivation.

loans.name: Nargis

texts.ru:
Наргис 35 летняя жительница не большого района под названием Шахритус. Она замужем и имеет троих детей. Наргис любит детей и этим связанна ее работа. Наргис работает воспитательницей в детском саду района Шахритус. Она считает, что ей очень повезло с работой. Она более 10 лет работает вот на этом садике.
  Муж Наргиса работает мясником. Они женаты очень давно. Когда говорили выражения муж голова, а жена шея имели в виду пару Наргиса и ее мужа. Наргис во всем помогает мужу. Данный кредит тоже связан с деятельностью мужа. Она хочет на часть заемных денег купить скота. Другую часть Наргис потратить на куплю мебели для дома. Он надеется, что ей не окажут в кредите и ее муж укрепить свой бизнес и улучшиться  качество их жизни.
texts.en:
Nargis is a 35 year old resident of the small region of Shahrituz. She is married and has three children. Nargis loves children and this is also her work. Nargis works as a kindergarten teacher in the Shahrituz region. She thinks she is very fortunate with her job. She has worked in this kindergarten for more than 10 years. 

Nargis' husband works as a butcher. They have been married a long time. When the expression "the man is the head and the woman is the neck" (Russian expression on how man and wife need eachother) was made, they were describing Nargis and her husband. Nargis helps her husband with everything. She also takes this loan for her husband's business. She would like to use part of the money to purchase livestock. The other part she will spend on purchasing furniture for their home. She hopes that she will not have to loan more and that her husband will strengthen his business and improve the quality of their life.

loans.use: to purchase livestock for her husband's business and to purchase furniture for their house

loans.name: Jeffrey

texts.en: Jeffrey has been providing transportation services to earn a living. He does this in order to support the financial needs of his parents. He has repaid successfully his previous loan used for buying motor accessories and tires. To make his services safe and secure, he took a new loan recently to purchase motor and engine parts for body repairs and maintenance. Maintaining good services has allowed him to engage in this business with dignity and determination. He plans to acquire another vehicle for expansion.

loans.use: to purchase motor and engine parts for body repairs and maintenance.

loans.name: Dilrabo

texts.ru: Дилрабо замужняя женщина в возрасте 38 лет. У нее четверо детей. Дилрабо трудолюбивая женщина. Она совмещает работу и домашние дела. Дилрабо дома занимается выращиванием крупнорогатого скота. Она держится за этот не большой бизнес, потому что он приносит хороший источник дохода, чтобы прокормить детей. Многие люди берут кредит для расширения своего бизнеса и увеличения бюджета. А такие люди как Дилрабо просят в займы для существования и улучшения самых малых жизненных условий с помощью труда и своей деятельности. Дилрабо на заемные деньги купить пару голов телят и бычков. Она полагается на Вашу доброту. Вы можете помочь Дилрабо.
texts.en:
Dilrabo is a married woman of the age of 38. She has four children. Dilrabo is a hardworking woman. She combines work and housework. 

Dilrabo works with breeding cattle at her house. She keeps this small business because it brings a good income in order to feed her children. Many people take a loan to expand their business and increase their budgets. People like Dilrabo request a loan for their existence and the smallest improvements to their living conditions through work and their own business. 

Dilrabo will purchase calves and bulls for the borrowed money. She relies on your kindness. You can help Dilrabo.

loans.use: to purchase cattle and expand her small business

loans.name: Angel Maria

texts.es:
Angel María tiene 63 años de edad, es conviviente, vive en casa propia, natural de la zona. La vida en el distrito es tranquila, sus pobladores se dedican a la agricultura y ganadería, como sustento principal, siembra y cosecha de banano, maíz, fréjol caupí. Etc. Su comunidad está ubicada en distrito de La Matanza, provincia de Morropón, región de Piura, costa norte de Perú.

La actividad que realiza Angel María es la venta de materiales de construcción(ladrillo), ademÁs su cÓnyugue de dedica ala crianza de aves de corral(patos, chivos, gallinas, entre otros), esta actividad la realiza desde hace más de 10 años, con experiencia en el negocio, con muy buenas referencias personales y laborales en la zona. Angel María cuenta con capacidad de pago. El destino del crédito será para capital de trabajo: mejoras de horno (LADRILLERA) y compra de leña, tierra, tamo de arroz. Lo que le permitirá en un corto plazo mejorar sus ingresos, aumentar sus ganancias y por ende mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia. El mercado presenta buenas perspectivas devido al crecimiento económico y poblacional de la zona.
texts.en:
Angel María is 63 years old, married and lives in his own traditional home in the area. Life in the district is quiet, its inhabitants are mainly engaged in agriculture and livestock farming, for example planting and harvesting of bananas, maize and black-eyed peas. The community is located in the district of La Matanza, province of Morropón, in the Piura region on the northern coast of Peru.

Angel María sells construction materials (bricks) and his wife raises small farm animals (ducks, goats, chickens, etc.). Angel María has over 10 years of experience in the business, with very good personal and work references in the region. He has the ability to pay. The loan is for working capital, to improve the brick-firing oven and buy wood, earth and rice chaff. 

This will enable him to improve his income in a short space of time, increase profits and thus improve his quality of life and that of his family. The market has good prospects due to economic and population growth in the area.

loans.use: to improve his brick-firing oven and buy firewood, earth, rice chaff

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy agricultural inputs for market gardening.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy agricultural inputs for market gardening.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase land

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy groundnut paste, monkey bread and sorrel for resale.

loans.name: Mavludakhon

texts.en:
Mavludakhon was born in 1958 and lives with her husband and 6 children in Tajikistan. Her house is located in the country.

Mavludakhon has been working in animal husbandry for 10 years. She has great experience in this field and this has helped her to develop her business further. She always tries to increase working capital and grow her business. 

She is asking for a loan of 5,000 Somoni (TJS) to buy cattle to increase her working capital. 

She awaits your mercy.

loans.use: To buy cattle to increase working capital

loans.name: Yelica

texts.es:
Yelica es una mujer de 33 años de edad, soltera, tiene tres hijos de 14, 7 y 4 años de edad, y su negocio es la panadería.
Ella es buena madre, independiente, trabajadora, constante y muy responsable. Su trabajo lo realiza en la zona ‘plan 3000’ el barrio más poblado de la ciudad, caracterizado por el comercio de inmigrantes de etnias del lugar como los ‘Ayoreos’ y mineros relocalizados de occidente, de clima cálido, tropical y húmedo con una temperatura constante de 30 grados centígrados durante todo el año.
Yelica es de tez morena, cabello negro largo, su lengua materna es el guaraní y habla español por el comercio. Su vida la realiza junto a sus tres hijos; los dos mayores estudian en la escuela y el menor se encuentra a su cuidado, viven en una casa construida de ladrillo que cuenta con agua potable y electricidad. Su negocio es el horneado de pan tradicional, variedades como; pan de arroz (a base de harina de arroz), Mollete (Es el pan corriente de harina, azúcar granulada y manteca), Pan dulce (se utiliza uvas pasas, huevo, leche y azúcar), Rosca de maíz (a base de maíz), Tortilla (Es la masa de pan, que primeramente se aplana, se espolvorea con azúcar y harina, se dobla lo aplanado y se repite varias veces obteniendo después de cocido una especie de pan de hojaldre), etc. su sueño es tener una panadería más grande y desea realizar la ampliación de su negocio realizando la compra de diferentes tipos de harina por mayor, como también de un horno para abastecer la demanda de fin de año. Esta es la tercera secuencia de préstamos con la institución en once años que viene realizando esta actividad. 
Es por esos motivos que Yelica solicita un préstamo para la compra de harina por mayor y un horno para abastecer la demanda de fin de año.
texts.en:
Yelica is a 33 year old woman, single, who has three children who are 14, 7, and 4 years old.  Her business is a bakery.
She is a good mother, independent, hard-working, persistent and very responsible.  She works in the Plan 3000 Zone, the most heavily populated area of the city, characterized by the business of immigrants of different ethnic groups of the place, such as the "Ayoreos" and miners relocated from the east.  The climate is warm, tropical and humid with a constant temperature of 30 degrees Centigrade throughtout the year.

Yelica has brown skin and long black year.  Her first language is  guaraní and she speaks Spanish because of business needs.  She lives with her three children; the two oldest are in school and the youngest is under her care.  They live in a house built of bricks which has running water and electricity.  

Her business is baking traditional bread, varieties such as:  rice bread (made with rice flour), mollete (the daily bread made of flour, granulated sugar and butter), sweet bread (raisins are used, also eggs, milk and sugar),  corn rosca (made of corn) tortilla (this is bread dough which first is flattened, then dusted with sugar and flour; then the flattened dough is doubled and this is done several times so that after being baked it is a kind of puffed bread,etc.  Her dream is to have a larger bakery and she wants to increase her business by buying different types of flour in bulk, and also an oven to meet demands during the end of the year.  This is the third sequence of loans with the institution in the eleven years she has been carrying out this work.  

These are the reasons Yelica is asking for a loan to buy flour in bulk and an oven to meet end of year demands.

loans.use: to buy flour in bulk and an oven to meet the customer demands of the year's end

loans.name: Atilano

texts.es:
Atilano tiene 34 años de edad, vive en casa propia de material rustico junto a su esposa y sus 03 hijos. El domicilio Atilano se ubica en el caserío san Bernardo de Inamiaco, aproximadamente a 1,5 hora del distrito de Queocotillo en la provincia de Cutervo, región Cajamarca. La comunidad donde vive Atilano es una pequeña zona rural donde los habitantes se conocen y se dedican básicamente a la agricultura, ganadería y al comercio.

La actividad que realiza Atilano es la de sembrar café variedad Catimor. El préstamo lo utilizará para invertir en mantenimiento del terreno cultivable. Esta inversión le permitirá asegurar una gran cosecha con un producto saludable y de calidad. Por lo que podrá vender su producto a un mejor precio y además captar un número mayor de clientes. Lo que le permitirá en un corto plazo mejorar sus ingresos, aumentar sus ganancias y por ende mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Atilano is 34 years old, he lives in his own home of rustic materials with his wife and their 3 children. Atilano's house is located in the village of San Bernardo de Inamiaco, approximately 1.5 hours from the Queocotillo district in the province of Cutervo, Cajamarca Region. The community where Atilano lives is a small rural zone where everyone knows each other and they mainly work in farming, cattle raising and trade.

Atilano works growing Catimor variety coffee. He will use the loan to maintain of a plot of land. This loan will allow him to ensure a big harvest with a healthy, quality product. Thus, he will be able to sell his product at a better price and also get a greater number of customers. This will enable him in the short tern to improve his earnings, increase his profits and thus improve his quality of life and that of his family.

loans.use: to maintain a plot of land.

loans.name: Bella Rosa

texts.en:
As a married parent of three children, Bellarosa works hard to support her family.

She has a general store business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from farming rice. She is borrowing PHP 30,000 through NWTF to buy items like shampoo, groceries, etc. to sell in her general store.

She successfully repaid her previous loan and now she has requested another loan to further build her businesses.

Bellarosa has been sustaining her business activities through her past 33 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her to attain her dream of saving money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy items to sell like shampoo, groceries, etc. to sell

loans.name: Ahmad

texts.en:
Ahmad is a 21-year-old, single man living in Ajloun. He is studying for his bachelor degree and is in his third year. 

Besides studying, Ahmad has a part time job as a baker that helps him to make some pocket money and pay for part of his university fees. He is applying for a loan now to help him cover his semester fees.

Ahmad’s future plan is to work in the field of his major, which is computer science.

loans.use: to cover his semester fees.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy fruit, sugar, milk, drinks, disposable products, churros, cookies, and other sweets to sell.

loans.name: Marta Azucena

texts.es: Durante treinta años todas las mañanas doña Martha se levanta para realizar todo el proceso para la elaboración y comercialización de rosquillas en Estelí. Está casada y tiene siete hijos  que ya son independientes. Comenzó la idea del negocio porque su suegra tenía un horno el cual solo era utilizado para consumo y ella pensó porque no hornear las rosquillas para comercializar y obtener ganancias, es así como popo a poco ha ido creciendo en el negocio ya que cuenta con el apoyo de sus hijos. Dentro de sus expectativas está ampliar su negocio y mejorar el taller donde elabora las rosquillas. Doña Marta solicita el crédito para la compra de materia prima tales como: Maíz, Manteca, Dulce, Queso y bolsas. Así lograra incrementar el volumen de producción y obtener las ganancias necesarias para remodelar su taller de rosquillas.
texts.en:
For thirty years, every morning Martha has gotten up to start the process of making and selling donuts in Estelí. She is married and has seven children who have already grown up. She started the idea of the business because her mother-in-law had an oven which was only used for their own cooking and she thought, why not bake donuts to sell and make a profit, that is how little by little her business has grown as she has support from her children. One of her aims is to expand the business and improve the workspace where the donuts are made.

Marta is asking for a loan to buy the raw ingredients such as maize, butter, sweetener, cheese and bags. Thus she will be able to increase her volume of production and get the income necessary to renovate her donut workspace.

loans.use: to buy maize, butter, sweetener, cheese and bags.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To pay for her son’s university tuition

loans.name: Ian Roy

texts.en:
Ian Roy earns income to support his needs from providing training services. He has been earning well for over nine years. 

He has a motorcycle which he uses for this activity, and now he plans to engage in another line of service, which is transportation. Therefore he has taken out a new loan to repair his vehicle and to buy a side car for his motorbike in order to expand his business.

His plan in the future is hopefully to improve his business by having his own gym.

loans.use: to repair his vehicle, and buy a side car for his motorbike to expand his business

loans.name: Gastine's Group

texts.en:
Gastine is 32 years old and has seven children. She is a group leader and is representing her group formed by 14 farmers in Matete District, Kenya. 

Gastine has been farming with One Acre Fund for years now, having joined the program for the first time in 2011. This decision was largely a result of her desire to have access to quality training and acquire new farming methods. Although she described her last harvest as good, she believes she could have a better one this year by continuing to work alongside One Acre Fund. 

Gastine also decided to purchase a solar light as part of her loan, which she is very excited about, as it will allow her to have light during dark hours for her children to be able to study.

Obtaining this loan means that Gastine's Group will be able to receive a total of six solar lights, as well as farming inputs to plant a total of eight acres.

loans.use: to purchase hybrid seeds and fertilizer for the cultivation of maize, as well as a solar light.

loans.name: Faith's Group

texts.en:
Pictured above is Faith, who, as a group leader, is representing her group, formed by 11 farmers in Matete District, Kenya. She is married and is a mother to four children, known by her community as a very hardworking individual.

Initially, Faith joined One Acre Fund in 2011 because she wanted to have access to quality training and acquire new farming methods. Since she joined the program she says that her life has improved, especially because she has learnt a lot from farming trainings. With the profits from the coming harvesting season, Faith plans to save more money for the future.
